There are fraudsters making all kinds of claims to trap victims online - from fake investment opportunities to online stores - and the internet allows them to operate from any part of the world with anonymity. The ability to spot online scams is an important skill to have as the virtual world is increasingly becoming a part of every facet of our lives. The below tips will help you identify the signs which can indicate that a website could be a scam. Common Sense: Too Good To Be True When looking for goods online, a great deal can be very enticing. A Gucci bag or a new iPhone for half the price? Who wouldn\u2019t want to grab such a deal? Scammers know this too and try to take advantage of the fact. If an online deal looks too good to be true, think twice and double-check things. The easiest way to do this is to simply check out the same product at competing websites (that you trust). If the difference in prices is huge, it might be better to double-check the rest of the website. Check Out the Social Media Links Social media is a core part of ecommerce businesses these days and consumers often expect online shops to have a social media presence. Scammers know this and often insert logos of social media sites on their websites. Well first of all, don\u2019t despair!! If you think you have been scammed, the first port of call when having an issue is to simply ask for a refund. This is the first and easiest step to determine whether you are dealing with a genuine company or scammers. Sadly, getting your money back from a scammer is not as simple as just asking.\u00a0 If you are indeed dealing with scammers, the procedure (and chance) of getting your money back varies depending on the payment method you used. PayPal Debit card/Credit card Bank transfer Wire transfer Google Pay Bitcoin PayPal If you used PayPal, you have a strong chance of getting your money back if you were scammed. On their website, you can file a dispute within 180 calendar days of your purchase. Conditions to file a dispute: The simplest situation is that you ordered from an online store and it has not arrived. It&#x27;s that simple.&quot; The scammer has sent you a completely different item. This website seems to offer content and possible also services in this area. Please make sure you are not investing in a scam. Check our article on \u301031\u2020How to check if a forex or investment site is legit or a scam?\u3011.\n\nThis website, which appears to provide banking, money lending, stock trading, and other financial services, is hosted on a shared server. An attacker might use one compromised website on the same server as a portal to all other websites on the same server if you employ a shared server for such data-sensitive services. We advise you to think twice about using this website&#x27;s services because the personal information you enter on it, and consequently, your device, could be hacked.\n\n### Webshop Review\n\nThe Tranco ranking of this website is low. This can be considered low in relation to other websites from the website&#x27;s country. If you think this website should be very popular, please invest additional time in researching the company as this is suspicious. For a smaller or starting website a low ranking can be considered normal.\n\nMost companies claim the name of their website (aka domain name) for only one year in advance. they can automatically renew the registration each year. We consider it a positive sign if a domain name is registered for more than one year in the future. It means that the company intends to do business for a long time. We increased the Trust Score of futurenest.com as a result.\n\nThe domain name of this website has been registered several years ago. In general, the older the website the more trustworthy it becomes. However, scammers sometimes buy existing websites and start doing their evil thing, so please make sure you check for other scammy attributes as well.\u00a0\n\n### \n\nTechnical Review\n\nWe identified an SSL certificate meaning that the data shared between your browser and the website is encrypted and cannot be read by others. SSL certificates are always used by legit and safe websites. Unfortunately scammers increasingly also use SSL certificates so it is no guarantee that you are visiting a reliable website.\n\n##  Facts about futurenest.com\n\nKey facts \n\nDomain age\n\n24 years from now\n\nWHOIS data\n\nhidden\n\nWebsite data \n\nWebsite\n\nfuturenest.com\n\nRedirecting from website\n\nfuturenest.com\n\nTitle\n\nHome | FutureNest, Inc.\n\nDomain age\n\n24 years from now\n\nWebsite Speed\n\nSlow\n\nSSL certificate valid\n\nvalid\n\nSSL type\n\nLow - Domain Validated Certificates (DV SSL)\n\nSSL issuer\n\nLet&#x27;s Encrypt\n\nWHOIS registration date\n\n 10:32:56\n\n## Popular Stories\n\n\u301033\u2020 How to Recognize a Scam Website \u3011 \n\nAs the influence of the internet rises, so does the prevalence of online scams. This website seems to offer content and possible also services in this area. Please make sure you are not investing in a scam. Check our article on \u301031\u2020How to check if a forex or investment site is legit or a scam?\u3011.\n\nThis website, which appears to provide banking, money lending, stock trading, and other financial services, is hosted on a shared server. An attacker might use one compromised website on the same server as a portal to all other websites on the same server if you employ a shared server for such data-sensitive services. We advise you to think twice about using this website&#x27;s services because the personal information you enter on it, and consequently, your device, could be hacked.\n\n### Webshop Review\n\nThe Tranco ranking of this website is low. This can be considered low in relation to other websites from the website&#x27;s country. If you think this website should be very popular, please invest additional time in researching the company as this is suspicious. For a smaller or starting website a low ranking can be considered normal.\n\nMost companies claim the name of their website (aka domain name) for only one year in advance. they can automatically renew the registration each year. We consider it a positive sign if a domain name is registered for more than one year in the future. It means that the company intends to do business for a long time. We increased the Trust Score of futurenest.com as a result.\n\nThe domain name of this website has been registered several years ago. In general, the older the website the more trustworthy it becomes. However, scammers sometimes buy existing websites and start doing their evil thing, so please make sure you check for other scammy attributes as well.\u00a0\n\n### \n\nTechnical Review\n\nWe identified an SSL certificate meaning that the data shared between your browser and the website is encrypted and cannot be read by others. SSL certificates are always used by legit and safe websites. Unfortunately scammers increasingly also use SSL certificates so it is no guarantee that you are visiting a reliable website.\n\n##  Facts about futurenest.com\n\nKey facts \n\nDomain age\n\n24 years from now\n\nWHOIS data\n\nhidden\n\nWebsite data \n\nWebsite\n\nfuturenest.com\n\nRedirecting from website\n\nfuturenest.com\n\nTitle\n\nHome | FutureNest, Inc.\n\nDomain age\n\n24 years from now\n\nWebsite Speed\n\nSlow\n\nSSL certificate valid\n\nvalid\n\nSSL type\n\nLow - Domain Validated Certificates (DV SSL)\n\nSSL issuer\n\nLet&#x27;s Encrypt\n\nWHOIS registration date\n\n 10:32:56\n\n## Popular Stories\n\n\u301033\u2020 How to Recognize a Scam Website \u3011 \n\nAs the influence of the internet rises, so does the prevalence of online scams. There are fraudsters making all kinds of claims to trap victims online - from fake investment opportunities to online stores - and the internet allows them to operate from any part of the world with anonymity. The ability to spot online scams is an important skill to have as the virtual world is increasingly becoming a part of every facet of our lives. The below tips will help you identify the signs which can indicate that a website could be a scam. Common Sense: Too Good To Be True When looking for goods online, a great deal can be very enticing. A Gucci bag or a new iPhone for half the price? Who wouldn\u2019t want to grab such a deal? Scammers know this too and try to take advantage of the fact. If an online deal looks too good to be true, think twice and double-check things. The easiest way to do this is to simply check out the same product at competing websites (that you trust). If the difference in prices is huge, it might be better to double-check the rest of the website. Check Out the Social Media Links Social media is a core part of ecommerce businesses these days and consumers often expect online shops to have a social media presence. Scammers know this and often insert logos of social media sites on their websites. Scratching beneath the surface often reveals this fu \n\n\u301033\u2020 Read more \u3011 \n\n\u301034\u2020 How Do I Get Money Back From a Scammer? \u3011 \n\nSo the worst has come to pass - you realise you parted with your money too fast, and the site you used was a scam - what now? Well first of all, don\u2019t despair!! If you think you have been scammed, the first port of call when having an issue is to simply ask for a refund. This is the first and easiest step to determine whether you are dealing with a genuine company or scammers. Sadly, getting your money back from a scammer is not as simple as just asking.\u00a0 If you are indeed dealing with scammers, the procedure (and chance) of getting your money back varies depending on the payment method you used. PayPal Debit card/Credit card Bank transfer Wire transfer Google Pay Bitcoin PayPal If you used PayPal, you have a strong chance of getting your money back if you were scammed. On their website, you can file a dispute within 180 calendar days of your purchase. Conditions to file a dispute: The simplest situation is that you ordered from an online store and it has not arrived. In this case this is what PayPal states: &quot;If your order never shows up and the seller can&#x27;t provide proof of shipment or delivery, you&#x27;ll get a full refund. It&#x27;s that simple.&quot; The scammer has sent you a completely different item. For example, you ordered a PlayStation 4, but instead received only a Playstation controller.\u00a0 The condition of the item was misrepresented on the product page. This website seems to offer content and possible also services in this area. Please make sure you are not investing in a scam. Check our article on \u301031\u2020How to check if a forex or investment site is legit or a scam?\u3011.\n\nThis website, which appears to provide banking, money lending, stock trading, and other financial services, is hosted on a shared server. An attacker might use one compromised website on the same server as a portal to all other websites on the same server if you employ a shared server for such data-sensitive services. We advise you to think twice about using this website&#x27;s services because the personal information you enter on it, and consequently, your device, could be hacked.\n\n### Webshop Review\n\nThe Tranco ranking of this website is low. This can be considered low in relation to other websites from the website&#x27;s country. If you think this website should be very popular, please invest additional time in researching the company as this is suspicious. For a smaller or starting website a low ranking can be considered normal.\n\nMost companies claim the name of their website (aka domain name) for only one year in advance. they can automatically renew the registration each year. We consider it a positive sign if a domain name is registered for more than one year in the future. It means that the company intends to do business for a long time. We increased the Trust Score of futurenest.com as a result.\n\nThe domain name of this website has been registered several years ago. In general, the older the website the more trustworthy it becomes. However, scammers sometimes buy existing websites and start doing their evil thing, so please make sure you check for other scammy attributes as well.\u00a0\n\n### \n\nTechnical Review\n\nWe identified an SSL certificate meaning that the data shared between your browser and the website is encrypted and cannot be read by others. SSL certificates are always used by legit and safe websites. Unfortunately scammers increasingly also use SSL certificates so it is no guarantee that you are visiting a reliable website.\n\n##  Facts about futurenest.com\n\nKey facts \n\nDomain age\n\n24 years from now\n\nWHOIS data\n\nhidden\n\nWebsite data \n\nWebsite\n\nfuturenest.com\n\nRedirecting from website\n\nfuturenest.com\n\nTitle\n\nHome | FutureNest, Inc.\n\nDomain age\n\n24 years from now\n\nWebsite Speed\n\nSlow\n\nSSL certificate valid\n\nvalid\n\nSSL type\n\nLow - Domain Validated Certificates (DV SSL)\n\nSSL issuer\n\nLet&#x27;s Encrypt\n\nWHOIS registration date\n\n 10:32:56\n\n## Popular Stories\n\n\u301033\u2020 How to Recognize a Scam Website \u3011 \n\nAs the influence of the internet rises, so does the prevalence of online scams. There are fraudsters making all kinds of claims to trap victims online - from fake investment opportunities to online stores - and the internet allows them to operate from any part of the world with anonymity. The ability to spot online scams is an important skill to have as the virtual world is increasingly becoming a part of every facet of our lives. The below tips will help you identify the signs which can indicate that a website could be a scam. Common Sense: Too Good To Be True When looking for goods online, a great deal can be very enticing. A Gucci bag or a new iPhone for half the price? Who wouldn\u2019t want to grab such a deal? Scammers know this too and try to take advantage of the fact. If an online deal looks too good to be true, think twice and double-check things. The easiest way to do this is to simply check out the same product at competing websites (that you trust). If the difference in prices is huge, it might be better to double-check the rest of the website. Check Out the Social Media Links Social media is a core part of ecommerce businesses these days and consumers often expect online shops to have a social media presence. Scammers know this and often insert logos of social media sites on their websites. Scratching beneath the surface often reveals this fu \n\n\u301033\u2020 Read more \u3011 \n\n\u301034\u2020 How Do I Get Money Back From a Scammer? \u3011 \n\nSo the worst has come to pass - you realise you parted with your money too fast, and the site you used was a scam - what now? Well first of all, don\u2019t despair!! If you think you have been scammed, the first port of call when having an issue is to simply ask for a refund. This is the first and easiest step to determine whether you are dealing with a genuine company or scammers. Sadly, getting your money back from a scammer is not as simple as just asking.\u00a0 If you are indeed dealing with scammers, the procedure (and chance) of getting your money back varies depending on the payment method you used. PayPal Debit card/Credit card Bank transfer Wire transfer Google Pay Bitcoin PayPal If you used PayPal, you have a strong chance of getting your money back if you were scammed. On their website, you can file a dispute within 180 calendar days of your purchase. Conditions to file a dispute: The simplest situation is that you ordered from an online store and it has not arrived. In this case this is what PayPal states: &quot;If your order never shows up and the seller can&#x27;t provide proof of shipment or delivery, you&#x27;ll get a full refund. It&#x27;s that simple.&quot; The scammer has sent you a completely different item. For example, you ordered a PlayStation 4, but instead received only a Playstation controller.\u00a0 The condition of the item was misrepresented on the product page. There are a few approaches to doing this:\n\n### 1. **Referral Programs for Recruiting**\n   Many companies use referral programs to encourage employees or external partners to recommend potential candidates for job openings. These referrals are incentivized by providing rewards, either as cash bonuses, gift cards, or other benefits, once the referred candidate gets hired and completes a probation period. This structure is quite similar to affiliate marketing, as referrers earn commissions for successful &quot;conversions.&quot;\n\n### 2. **Affiliate Recruiting Networks**\n   Some platforms work like affiliate marketing networks but specifically focus on recruiting. These platforms allow people to become &quot;affiliates&quot; by promoting job listings or career opportunities for specific companies. If a candidate applies and gets hired via the affiliate\u2019s referral link, the affiliate earns a commission. Examples of such platforms include:\n   - **Indeed** and **Glassdoor** sometimes allow partner integrations, where traffic or candidates referred from certain partners generate commissions.\n   - **JobTarget** offers a service to distribute job postings across multiple job boards and uses a commission model to encourage partnerships.\n  \n### 3. **Social Recruiting with Affiliate Strategies**\n   Similar to influencer marketing, recruiters or employers can partner with social media influencers who promote job openings to their audience. These influencers may earn a commission or flat fee for each successful candidate they refer. This is especially effective in niche industries where certain influencers have a relevant audience (e.g., tech, creative fields).\n\n### 4. **Platform-Based Recruiting Referral Programs**\n   Platforms like **Workable** and **SmartRecruiters** offer built-in tools for referral recruiting. Companies can share job postings with employees, who in turn can share them with their networks, and receive rewards if those contacts are hired. This turns every employee into an affiliate-like recruiter.\n\n### 5. **Recruitment Marketing Agencies**\n   Agencies that specialize in recruitment marketing can also operate on a performance-based model, similar to affiliate marketing. They help drive candidate applications to employers, and they are paid based on metrics such as the number of successful hires.\n\n### 6. **Freelance Recruiter Platforms**\n   Platforms like **Hiretual** and **Recruitifi** allow freelance recruiters to submit candidates to companies\u2019 open positions. Freelance recruiters are paid when their candidates are successfully hired, which is similar to an affiliate commission model.\n\n### 7. **Utilizing Affiliate Networks for Job Listings**\n   Some affiliate marketing networks, like **CJ Affiliate** or **ShareASale**, may include programs related to education or career services. Affiliates in this scenario could earn commissions by promoting educational courses or certifications that lead to employment opportunities, thus indirectly participating in the recruitment process.\n\nIf you&#x27;re interested in starting something like this, consider partnering with companies that have open affiliate programs in the recruitment space or creating your own referral network targeting specific niches or industries."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop_tokens": [200002]}, smaller space.\n\n5. **Choose a Background**:\n   - Use a simple, light lavender or pastel color to match your current branding but avoid distracting from the central logo elements.\n\n6. **Adjust the "8d3e81d11d803750-MXP", "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "browser", "channel": null}, "parent": "3af1db76-c98e-4183-b1b5-de555cf1780e", "children": ["7600c72a-1d5d-4e28-97e5-c7ed921786f1"]}, "7600c72a-1d5d-4e28-97e5-c7ed921786f1": {"id": "7600c72a-1d5d-4e28-97e5-c7ed921786f1", "message": {"id": "7600c72a-1d5d-4e28-97e5-c7ed921786f1", "author": {"role": "tool", "name": "browser", "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1729149436.568395, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "tether_quote", "url": "https://www.htt.it/en/tiktok-shop-also-arrives-in-europe-online-shopping/", "domain": "www.htt.it", "text": "But Instagram and Facebook represent only two showcases for brands, and purchases continue to be made on e-commerce and marketplace platforms. In fact, although it is possible to upload the catalog of products on Meta, content with clickable products always redirects to an external product page outside of the social media platform, and in fact Meta does not manage the transaction (except with specific solutions for some countries and for some Profiles/Brands, as of today).\n\nWith TikTok Shop, on the other hand, you can complete a purchase in a few clicks without ever leaving the app. TikTok provides seller support and should handle orders, shipments, and money flow internally.  \nIn this way, TikTok Shop would position itself as a kind of integrated marketplace within the social media platform.\n\nTikTok provides 4 native formats for shopping on the platform:\n\n  * Live shopping: You can purchase directly during creators\u2019 live streams by tapping on pinned products or exploring the shopping icon.\n  * Shoppable videos: In-feed video content with clickable shop icons.\n  * Product showcase: Showcase of products that you can find on brand or creator profiles.\n  * Shop tab: Personalized shopping exploration section that groups various brands and different types of content.\n\n[Image 1: Immagine con 3 mockup di smartphone con differenti schermate di Tik Tok Shop][Image 2: Immagine con 3 mockup di smartphone con differenti schermate di Tik Tok Shop]\n\n## The crucial role of creators in TikTok Shop \n\nIf creators were already crucial on Instagram, they become even more so on TikTok. The reason is simple.  \nIn-App purchases allow creators to sell the products they promote directly.  \nWhile on Meta, creators or influencers lend their testimony to drive traffic and conversions to the websites of the brands they collaborate with, on TikTok, users purchase directly through the creators\u2019 channels.\n\nThis has two fundamental consequences:\n\n  1. Small businesses enter the game by creating content to sell their products directly. In this initial phase, TikTok\u2019s algorithm favors Shop content, offering great visibility to sellers and favorable commissions.\n  2. Medium/large brands can rely on creators to sell their products, without the need to internally produce content. This way, the brand does not have to invest resources in managing social media and can leverage the creator\u2019s fanbase.\n\nThe role of creators is therefore increasingly crucial in supporting brands in their online sales. The advertising style of creators is engaging and fun, reducing friction in the consumer\u2019s purchase journey, who immediately associates a positive feeling with the product being sold.  \nOne could speak of \u201cadvertainment\u201d, a creative and well-executed advertising message, that also provides entertainment to users who choose to watch it.\n\n### Collaborations with creators are more transparent thanks to the Tik Tok Affiliation circuit \n\nMore and more brands are opting to collaborate with influencers and creators for promoting their products, but the results are not always as expected.\n\nOn Instagram, we\u2019re accustomed to hefty paychecks, with no guarantee in return that the influencer\u2019s testimony adds value to the promotion.  \nThe fee is determined by the number of contents produced by the influencer rather than the actual sales generated by their content.  \nThis opaque collaboration mode has led to a sentiment of distrust towards influencer marketing in some cases. Consider the recent Balocco case: Chiara Ferragni received a high fee for promoting the pandori, which was not tied to the quantity of pandori sold, nor was the charity donation amount linked to the promo\u2019s success.\n\nBut on TikTok, the Affiliation circuit addresses this issue. The affiliation circuit serves as a platform that connects sellers looking to promote their products through influencers with creators seeking commercial opportunities and products to recommend. Once the partnership between the seller and influencer is established, the creator\u2019s commission is automatically paid by the platform when a user makes a purchase directly from their channel. This way, the seller only pays the influencer based on the sales they generate on their profile.  \nThe affiliation circuit also benefits creators by providing them with a platform to showcase themselves to brands, without the need for intermediary influencer marketing agencies. Additionally, even creators with a limited fanbase will have the opportunity to monetize, as the promo fee will depend solely on their ability to communicate with their audience.\n\nTikTok\u2019s affiliation circuit thus represents a default and transparent mode of operation for influencer marketing, ushering in a new era that is fairer and based on merit.\n\n[Image 3: Immagine con 4 mockup di smartphone che rappresentano le fasi di acquisto su Tik Tok Shop: Product link, product detail page, selection option e checkout][Image 4: Immagine con 4 mockup di smartphone che rappresentano le fasi di acquisto su Tik Tok Shop: Product link, product detail page, selection option e checkout]\n\n### Which product categories are popular on TikTok Shop?\n\nAlthough the TikTok Shop experience has just begun, we already have the first statistics from the United States telling us which products are most appreciated and purchased by TikTok users.\n\nThe Beauty and Personal Care sector is decidedly the most appreciated, representing 22.5% of the entire market share. Women\u2019s Clothing and Intimates is the second most purchased category through TikTok Shop, accounting for 12.5% of purchases, while Men\u2019s Clothing and Intimates ranks third, with a preference rate of 8%.\n\nAs is already the case on Instagram, on TikTok, the female target audience appears to be the most responsive to the allure of social shopping.\n\nDo you want to sell online or are you looking for someone to boost your sales?\n\n####    \nDiscuss it with Matteo!\n\nMatteo Doveri Account Executive\n\n\u30107\u2020Book a meeting\u3011\n\n#### Continua a leggere \n\n4 minutes of reading\n\n[Image 5: Environment, the hidden CO2 emissions of the Internet][Image 6: Environment, the hidden CO2 emissions of", "title": "TikTok Shop also arrives in Europe. The new function that will change the approach to online shopping. - HT&amp;T Consulting .", "tether_id": null}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 0.0, "metadata": {"_cite_metadata": {"citation_format": {"name": "tether_og"}, "metadata_list": [{"type": "webpage", "title": "TikTok Shop also arrives in Europe. The new function that will change the approach to online shopping. - HT&amp;T Consulting .", "url": "https://www.htt.it/en/tiktok-shop-also-arrives-in-europe-online-shopping/", "text": "But Instagram and Facebook represent only two showcases for brands, and purchases continue to be made on e-commerce and marketplace platforms. In fact, although it is possible to upload the catalog of products on Meta, content with clickable products always redirects to an external product page outside of the social media platform, and in fact Meta does not manage the transaction (except with specific solutions for some countries and for some Profiles/Brands, as of today).\n\nWith TikTok Shop, on the other hand, you can complete a purchase in a few clicks without ever leaving the app. TikTok provides seller support and should handle orders, shipments, and money flow internally.  \nIn this way, TikTok Shop would position itself as a kind of integrated marketplace within the social media platform.\n\nTikTok provides 4 native formats for shopping on the platform:\n\n  * Live shopping: You can purchase directly during creators\u2019 live streams by tapping on pinned products or exploring the shopping icon.\n  * Shoppable videos: In-feed video content with clickable shop icons.\n  * Product showcase: Showcase of products that you can find on brand or creator profiles.\n  * Shop tab: Personalized shopping exploration section that groups various brands and different types of content.\n\n[Image 1: Immagine con 3 mockup di smartphone con differenti schermate di Tik Tok Shop][Image 2: Immagine con 3 mockup di smartphone con differenti schermate di Tik Tok Shop]\n\n## The crucial role of creators in TikTok Shop \n\nIf creators were already crucial on Instagram, they become even more so on TikTok. The reason is simple.  \nIn-App purchases allow creators to sell the products they promote directly.  \nWhile on Meta, creators or influencers lend their testimony to drive traffic and conversions to the websites of the brands they collaborate with, on TikTok, users purchase directly through the creators\u2019 channels.\n\nThis has two fundamental consequences:\n\n  1. Small businesses enter the game by creating content to sell their products directly. In this initial phase, TikTok\u2019s algorithm favors Shop content, offering great visibility to sellers and favorable commissions.\n  2. Medium/large brands can rely on creators to sell their products, without the need to internally produce content. This way, the brand does not have to invest resources in managing social media and can leverage the creator\u2019s fanbase.\n\nThe role of creators is therefore increasingly crucial in supporting brands in their online sales. The advertising style of creators is engaging and fun, reducing friction in the consumer\u2019s purchase journey, who immediately associates a positive feeling with the product being sold.  \nOne could speak of \u201cadvertainment\u201d, a creative and well-executed advertising message, that also provides entertainment to users who choose to watch it.\n\n### Collaborations with creators are more transparent thanks to the Tik Tok Affiliation circuit \n\nMore and more brands are opting to collaborate with influencers and creators for promoting their products, but the results are not always as expected.\n\nOn Instagram, we\u2019re accustomed to hefty paychecks, with no guarantee in return that the influencer\u2019s testimony adds value to the promotion.  \nThe fee is determined by the number of contents produced by the influencer rather than the actual sales generated by their content.  \nThis opaque collaboration mode has led to a sentiment of distrust towards influencer marketing in some cases. Consider the recent Balocco case: Chiara Ferragni received a high fee for promoting the pandori, which was not tied to the quantity of pandori sold, nor was the charity donation amount linked to the promo\u2019s success.\n\nBut on TikTok, the Affiliation circuit addresses this issue. The affiliation circuit serves as a platform that connects sellers looking to promote their products through influencers with creators seeking commercial opportunities and products to recommend. Once the partnership between the seller and influencer is established, the creator\u2019s commission is automatically paid by the platform when a user makes a purchase directly from their channel. This way, the seller only pays the influencer based on the sales they generate on their profile.  \nThe affiliation circuit also benefits creators by providing them with a platform to showcase themselves to brands, without the need for intermediary influencer marketing agencies. Additionally, even creators with a limited fanbase will have the opportunity to monetize, as the promo fee will depend solely on their ability to communicate with their audience.\n\nTikTok\u2019s affiliation circuit thus represents a default and transparent mode of operation for influencer marketing, ushering in a new era that is fairer and based on merit.\n\n[Image 3: Immagine con 4 mockup di smartphone che rappresentano le fasi di acquisto su Tik Tok Shop: Product link, product detail page, selection option e checkout][Image 4: Immagine con 4 mockup di smartphone che rappresentano le fasi di acquisto su Tik Tok Shop: Product link, product detail page, selection option e checkout]\n\n### Which product categories are popular on TikTok Shop?\n\nAlthough the TikTok Shop experience has just begun, we already have the first statistics from the United States telling us which products are most appreciated and purchased by TikTok users.\n\nThe Beauty and Personal Care sector is decidedly the most appreciated, representing 22.5% of the entire market share. Women\u2019s Clothing and Intimates is the second most purchased category through TikTok Shop, accounting for 12.5% of purchases, while Men\u2019s Clothing and Intimates ranks third, with a preference rate of 8%.\n\nAs is already the case on Instagram, on TikTok, the female target audience appears to be the most responsive to the allure of social shopping.\n\nDo you want to sell online or are you looking for someone to boost your sales?\n\n####    \nDiscuss it with Matteo!\n\nMatteo Doveri Account Executive\n\n\u30107\u2020Book a meeting\u3011\n\n#### Continua a leggere \n\n4 minutes of reading\n\n[Image 5: Environment, the hidden CO2 emissions of the Internet][Image 6: Environment, the hidden CO2 emissions of", "pub_date": null, "extra": null}], "original_query": null}, "command": "mclick", "args": ["[0, 3, 11, 13, 10]"], "status": "finished", "is_complete": true, "message_type": null, "model_slug": "gpt-4o", "default_model_slug": "gpt-4o", "parent_id": "337d9a46-0852-4700-8f4c-34f05c46e4d8", "request_id": "8d3e81d11d803750-MXP", "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "337d9a46-0852-4700-8f4c-34f05c46e4d8", "children": ["6a88798d-c151-4eec-adb4-1ccc1a668b36"]}, "6a88798d-c151-4eec-adb4-1ccc1a668b36": {"id": "6a88798d-c151-4eec-adb4-1ccc1a668b36", "message": {"id": "6a88798d-c151-4eec-adb4-1ccc1a668b36", "author": {"role": "tool", "name": "browser", "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1729149436.568463, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "tether_quote", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "domain": "ads.tiktok.com", "text": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. TikTok Shop e le Presentazioni non sono uguali.\n\n     * Se hai soltanto una Vetrina e non un TikTok Shop, puoi comunque fare pubblicit\u00e0 utilizzando i prodotti nella tua vetrina e fare riferimento a \u30103\u2020Come configurare Video Shopping Ads con Vetrina\u3011.\n\n     * Se scegli Vetrina o TikTok Shop come origine prodotto, l\u2019elenco dei prodotti che possono essere selezionati per la pubblicit\u00e0 cambia di conseguenza.\n\n     * Ricordati che TikTok Shop contiene l\u2019inventario dei prodotti di propriet\u00e0 del venditore. Se vendi i prodotti attraverso un account affiliato o di marketing, \u00e8 possibile che tu possieda un TikTok Shop.\n\n  2. Da notare che non tutti coloro che possiedono una Vetrina hanno un TikTok Shop.\n\n     * Ad esempio, un brand pu\u00f2 concedere a un terzo l\u2019autorizzazione a vendere prodotti a suo nome. Questi prodotti sono visualizzati nella Vetrina del terzo per essere acquistati dai clienti. Un terzo non possiede i prodotti che vende, ma piuttosto vende i prodotti per conto del brand.\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere per utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\nPossedere una Vetrina non significa necessariamente possedere un TikTok Shop. Gli esempi che seguono mostrano i diversi scenari che si verificano tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina.\n\n### Esempi \n\n  1. Per un account TikTok ufficiale, tutti i prodotti di un brand verranno automaticamente visualizzati nella loro Vetrina.\n\n  2. Un brand pu\u00f2 consentire agli account commerciali/affiliati di vendere i prodotti per suo conto. La Vetrina degli account commerciali/affiliati visualizzer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un negozio.\n\n     * Esempio 1: un brand di calzature pu\u00f2 consentire a pi\u00f9 account commerciali, gestiti da terzi, di vendere prodotti a suo nome.\n\n     * Esempio 2: due brand diversi di calzature possono consentire a un account affiliato/di marketing gestito da un importante rivenditore al dettaglio o da uno store specializzato di vendere prodotti per conto di entrambi i brand.\n\n## Come utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina\n\n### Come account TikTok ufficiale \n\nSe sei un account TikTok ufficiale con un TikTok Shop, la tua Vetrina mostrer\u00e0 tutti i tuoi prodotti.\n\n##### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok ufficiale. Dopo che il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok ha confermato il link, tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop vengono automaticamente visualizzati nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese in cui vende lo shop. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30109\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301010\u2020Stati Uniti\u2020seller-us.tiktok.com\u3011 e \u301011\u2020Vietnam\u2020seller-vn.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\n  * Ciascun TikTok Shop pu\u00f2 disporre di 1 solo account TikTok ufficiale.\n\n  * Ciascun account TikTok pu\u00f2 essere collegato a 1 solo TikTok Shop come account TikTok ufficiale. Un account TikTok ufficiale non pu\u00f2 essere collegato ad altri TikTok Shop.\n\n### Come account TikTok per il marketing \n\nLa tua vetrina mostrer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un brand.\n\n#### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok per il marketing. Dopo aver confermato il link, il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok pu\u00f2 selezionare alcuni o tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop per mostrarli nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301012\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301013\u2020St", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "tether_id": null}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 0.0, "metadata": {"_cite_metadata": {"citation_format": {"name": "tether_og"}, "metadata_list": [{"type": "webpage", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "text": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en", "domain": "ads.tiktok.com", "text": "\nURL: https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en\n\u30100\u2020 Business Help Center\u3011 \n\n\u30101\u2020Create an Ad\u3011\n\n[Image 0] \n\nConsiderations when launching your TikTok Shop Journey\n\nLast updated, May 2024 \n\nTikTok Shop is now available in the following markets: Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam.\n\nYou can directly create your TikTok Shop at \u30102\u2020TikTok Seller Center\u2020seller.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\nAfter creating your TikTok Shop, start your marketing and sales efforts with these recommended steps. \n\n1. Maximize the products uploaded to TikTok Shop (TTS). Do not only upload your bestselling products or products that you believe will sell well on TikTok Shop. We strongly recommend uploading all products available to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n2. Maximize the number of Shoppable Video posts on your TikTok account. Do not only upload videos that have performed well on other platforms or that you believe will perform well on TikTok. Uploading videos on TikTok requires no additional costs. We strongly recommend posting as many videos as possible on your TikTok account to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n3. Add TikTok Shop Product Link (the little orange cart) to all relevant videos on your TikTok account. While it is best practice to ensure the linked product matches the video content, it is more important to have a TikTok Shop Product Link on as many video posts as possible.\n\n4. Participate in the open affiliate plan. You may participate in the targeted plan if you are already familiar with creators and have an existing creator pipeline. Tips on commission rate: If no benchmarks have been set before, we recommend starting with a 10% commission rate, and gradually reducing it to 5% or 1% as your TikTok Shop GMV grows.\n\n5. Start with \u30103\u2020Video Shopping Ads\u3011 (VSA) for TikTok Shop, prioritizing existing videos from your TikTok account that have already generated organic conversions (Spark Ads). Note that when using an existing video as an asset for Video Shopping Ads, the Video Shopping Ads will use the products chosen during ad creation in the ad link. You can choose to advertise the same or different list of products for the Video Shopping Ads vs. the organic link. You can even run a Video Shopping Ads with an existing video that has no organic link.\n\n6. If using new videos as an asset for Video Shopping Ads through TikTok Ads Manager (not using Spark Ads), we recommend posting the video with the TikTok Shop Product Link on your TikTok account first, unless you are testing multiple variations of video captions, for which you may choose ads-only mode for some of the ads.\n\n7. Try to acquire affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you and/or have high GPM (GMV per impression) as ad creatives assets. Obtain the video code from the affiliate creator. You can see all affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you in the affiliate section of Seller Center and directly message the creator from Seller Center via Creator Connect.\n\n8. Try to use as many videos and/or TikTok Shop Product Links as possible under the same VSA ad group budget, ideally with 3-5 active video creatives in each ad group. Use the highest gross revenue and cost cap bid strategies according to preference and experiment with a combination of these two bid strategies. Experiment with using single product links (only one product per ad) and multiple product links (multiple products per ad) to test what works better for your business, as results may vary for different sellers.\n\n9. For the highest gross revenue ad group, keep scaling the budget every week, each time observing the ROAS of the previous 7 days on a rolling basis, and increase or decrease the budget as necessary. For cost cap, we recommend maximizing the budget after the ad has run for more than a day.\n\n10. Besides the 1 official TikTok account connected to your TikTok Shop, you can additionally connect up to 4 more TikTok accounts with your TikTok Shop for marketing purposes. Take advantage of this by differentiating your marketing accounts based on persona categories to cater to different audience preferences, presenting &quot;UGC&quot; style native content. This helps to broaden your interested audiences.\n\n11. If you are running a LIVE Shopping event, we highly recommend running \u30104\u2020Live Shopping Ads\u3011 (LSA), optimizing towards Gross Revenue, and starting with a budget of a few hundred dollars. LIVE Shopping events or LSA may or may not work well for your business. LIVE Shopping performance can be volatile but can work well for some businesses.\n\n12. TikTok Shop does not only offer ads GMV but also trackable organic GMV. It also offers a potentially large pool of &quot;referral&quot; style affiliate creatives that you can use for ads or other purposes.\n\n13. When considering Shop Ads performance, in addition to reviewing Shop Ads ROAS performance, we recommend reviewing overall TikTok Shop marketing ROI, which equates to [Shop total GMV / (Shop Ads ads cost + Shop affiliate commission)]. Consider how much GMV (paid, affiliate, organic) you are getting out of your marketing investment in TikTok Shop. Evaluate your TikTok Shop marketing ROI against your typical marketing ROI targets.\n\nContent Hide content \n\nOur Products\n\n* \u30105\u2020TikTok for Business\u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30106\u2020TikTok\u2020tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30107\u2020Creative Center\u3011\n\n\u30100\u2020 \u3011 \n\n\u00a92024 TikTok For Business \n\n* \u30108\u2020 Terms &amp; Policies \u3011\n* \u30109\u2020 Privacy \u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30100\u2020 Help \u3011\nVisible: 0% - 100%", "title": "Business Help Center", "tether_id": null}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 0.0, "metadata": {"_cite_metadata": {"citation_format": {"name": "tether_og"}, "metadata_list": [{"type": "webpage", "title": "Business Help Center", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en", "text": "\nURL: https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en\n\u30100\u2020 Business Help Center\u3011 \n\n\u30101\u2020Create an Ad\u3011\n\n[Image 0] \n\nConsiderations when launching your TikTok Shop Journey\n\nLast updated, May 2024 \n\nTikTok Shop is now available in the following markets: Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam.\n\nYou can directly create your TikTok Shop at \u30102\u2020TikTok Seller Center\u2020seller.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\nAfter creating your TikTok Shop, start your marketing and sales efforts with these recommended steps. \n\n1. Maximize the products uploaded to TikTok Shop (TTS). Do not only upload your bestselling products or products that you believe will sell well on TikTok Shop. We strongly recommend uploading all products available to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n2. Maximize the number of Shoppable Video posts on your TikTok account. Do not only upload videos that have performed well on other platforms or that you believe will perform well on TikTok. Uploading videos on TikTok requires no additional costs. We strongly recommend posting as many videos as possible on your TikTok account to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n3. Add TikTok Shop Product Link (the little orange cart) to all relevant videos on your TikTok account. While it is best practice to ensure the linked product matches the video content, it is more important to have a TikTok Shop Product Link on as many video posts as possible.\n\n4. Participate in the open affiliate plan. You may participate in the targeted plan if you are already familiar with creators and have an existing creator pipeline. Tips on commission rate: If no benchmarks have been set before, we recommend starting with a 10% commission rate, and gradually reducing it to 5% or 1% as your TikTok Shop GMV grows.\n\n5. Start with \u30103\u2020Video Shopping Ads\u3011 (VSA) for TikTok Shop, prioritizing existing videos from your TikTok account that have already generated organic conversions (Spark Ads). Note that when using an existing video as an asset for Video Shopping Ads, the Video Shopping Ads will use the products chosen during ad creation in the ad link. You can choose to advertise the same or different list of products for the Video Shopping Ads vs. the organic link. You can even run a Video Shopping Ads with an existing video that has no organic link.\n\n6. If using new videos as an asset for Video Shopping Ads through TikTok Ads Manager (not using Spark Ads), we recommend posting the video with the TikTok Shop Product Link on your TikTok account first, unless you are testing multiple variations of video captions, for which you may choose ads-only mode for some of the ads.\n\n7. Try to acquire affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you and/or have high GPM (GMV per impression) as ad creatives assets. Obtain the video code from the affiliate creator. You can see all affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you in the affiliate section of Seller Center and directly message the creator from Seller Center via Creator Connect.\n\n8. Try to use as many videos and/or TikTok Shop Product Links as possible under the same VSA ad group budget, ideally with 3-5 active video creatives in each ad group. Use the highest gross revenue and cost cap bid strategies according to preference and experiment with a combination of these two bid strategies. Experiment with using single product links (only one product per ad) and multiple product links (multiple products per ad) to test what works better for your business, as results may vary for different sellers.\n\n9. For the highest gross revenue ad group, keep scaling the budget every week, each time observing the ROAS of the previous 7 days on a rolling basis, and increase or decrease the budget as necessary. For cost cap, we recommend maximizing the budget after the ad has run for more than a day.\n\n10. Besides the 1 official TikTok account connected to your TikTok Shop, you can additionally connect up to 4 more TikTok accounts with your TikTok Shop for marketing purposes. Take advantage of this by differentiating your marketing accounts based on persona categories to cater to different audience preferences, presenting &quot;UGC&quot; style native content. This helps to broaden your interested audiences.\n\n11. If you are running a LIVE Shopping event, we highly recommend running \u30104\u2020Live Shopping Ads\u3011 (LSA), optimizing towards Gross Revenue, and starting with a budget of a few hundred dollars. LIVE Shopping events or LSA may or may not work well for your business. LIVE Shopping performance can be volatile but can work well for some businesses.\n\n12. TikTok Shop does not only offer ads GMV but also trackable organic GMV. It also offers a potentially large pool of &quot;referral&quot; style affiliate creatives that you can use for ads or other purposes.\n\n13. When considering Shop Ads performance, in addition to reviewing Shop Ads ROAS performance, we recommend reviewing overall TikTok Shop marketing ROI, which equates to [Shop total GMV / (Shop Ads ads cost + Shop affiliate commission)]. Consider how much GMV (paid, affiliate, organic) you are getting out of your marketing investment in TikTok Shop. "bf02a947-fc9d-40cf-b405-2224b219d29c", "request_id": "8d3e81d11d803750-MXP", "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "bf02a947-fc9d-40cf-b405-2224b219d29c", "children": ["f4ec6c96-662e-4b67-9f5a-473fbd6954df"]}, "f4ec6c96-662e-4b67-9f5a-473fbd6954df": {"id": "f4ec6c96-662e-4b67-9f5a-473fbd6954df", "message": {"id": "f4ec6c96-662e-4b67-9f5a-473fbd6954df", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1729149436.568652, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Yes, TikTok Shop is available in Italy as of 2024. The feature allows users to purchase products directly through the app, including during live streams and through shoppable videos. It integrates shopping into the TikTok experience, making it convenient for businesses and creators to sell items and for users to buy them without leaving the platform. This functionality is part of TikTok&#x27;s growing social commerce strategy across several markets, including Europe\u30108\u2020source\u3011\u30109\u2020source\u3011."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"citations": [{"start_ix": 465, "end_ix": 475, "citation_format_type": "tether_og", "metadata": {"type": "webpage", "title": "TikTok Shop also arrives in Europe. The new function that will change the approach to online shopping. - HT&amp;T Consulting .", "url": "https://www.htt.it/en/tiktok-shop-also-arrives-in-europe-online-shopping/", "text": "But Instagram and Facebook represent only two showcases for brands, and purchases continue to be made on e-commerce and marketplace platforms. In fact, although it is possible to upload the catalog of products on Meta, content with clickable products always redirects to an external product page outside of the social media platform, and in fact Meta does not manage the transaction (except with specific solutions for some countries and for some Profiles/Brands, as of today).\n\nWith TikTok Shop, on the other hand, you can complete a purchase in a few clicks without ever leaving the app. TikTok provides seller support and should handle orders, shipments, and money flow internally.  \nIn this way, TikTok Shop would position itself as a kind of integrated marketplace within the social media platform.\n\nTikTok provides 4 native formats for shopping on the platform:\n\n  * Live shopping: You can purchase directly during creators\u2019 live streams by tapping on pinned products or exploring the shopping icon.\n  * Shoppable videos: In-feed video content with clickable shop icons.\n  * Product showcase: Showcase of products that you can find on brand or creator profiles.\n  * Shop tab: Personalized shopping exploration section that groups various brands and different types of content.\n\n[Image 1: Immagine con 3 mockup di smartphone con differenti schermate di Tik Tok Shop][Image 2: Immagine con 3 mockup di smartphone con differenti schermate di Tik Tok Shop]\n\n## The crucial role of creators in TikTok Shop \n\nIf creators were already crucial on Instagram, they become even more so on TikTok. The reason is simple.  \nIn-App purchases allow creators to sell the products they promote directly.  \nWhile on Meta, creators or influencers lend their testimony to drive traffic and conversions to the websites of the brands they collaborate with, on TikTok, users purchase directly through the creators\u2019 channels.\n\nThis has two fundamental consequences:\n\n  1. Small businesses enter the game by creating content to sell their products directly. In this initial phase, TikTok\u2019s algorithm favors Shop content, offering great visibility to sellers and favorable commissions.\n  2. Medium/large brands can rely on creators to sell their products, without the need to internally produce content. This way, the brand does not have to invest resources in managing social media and can leverage the creator\u2019s fanbase.\n\nThe role of creators is therefore increasingly crucial in supporting brands in their online sales. The advertising style of creators is engaging and fun, reducing friction in the consumer\u2019s purchase journey, who immediately associates a positive feeling with the product being sold.  \nOne could speak of \u201cadvertainment\u201d, a creative and well-executed advertising message, that also provides entertainment to users who choose to watch it.\n\n### Collaborations with creators are more transparent thanks to the Tik Tok Affiliation circuit \n\nMore and more brands are opting to collaborate with influencers and creators for promoting their products, but the results are not always as expected.\n\nOn Instagram, we\u2019re accustomed to hefty paychecks, with no guarantee in return that the influencer\u2019s testimony adds value to the promotion.  \nThe fee is determined by the number of contents produced by the influencer rather than the actual sales generated by their content.  \nThis opaque collaboration mode has led to a sentiment of distrust towards influencer marketing in some cases. Consider the recent Balocco case: Chiara Ferragni received a high fee for promoting the pandori, which was not tied to the quantity of pandori sold, nor was the charity donation amount linked to the promo\u2019s success.\n\nBut on TikTok, the Affiliation circuit addresses this issue. The affiliation circuit serves as a platform that connects sellers looking to promote their products through influencers with creators seeking commercial opportunities and products to recommend. Once the partnership between the seller and influencer is established, the creator\u2019s commission is automatically paid by the platform when a user makes a purchase directly from their channel. This way, the seller only pays the influencer based on the sales they generate on their profile.  \nThe affiliation circuit also benefits creators by providing them with a platform to showcase themselves to brands, without the need for intermediary influencer marketing agencies. Additionally, even creators with a limited fanbase will have the opportunity to monetize, as the promo fee will depend solely on their ability to communicate with their audience.\n\nTikTok\u2019s affiliation circuit thus represents a default and transparent mode of operation for influencer marketing, ushering in a new era that is fairer and based on merit.\n\n[Image 3: Immagine con 4 mockup di smartphone che rappresentano le fasi di acquisto su Tik Tok Shop: Product link, product detail page, selection option e checkout][Image 4: Immagine con 4 mockup di smartphone che rappresentano le fasi di acquisto su Tik Tok Shop: Product link, product detail page, selection option e checkout]\n\n### Which product categories are popular on TikTok Shop?\n\nAlthough the TikTok Shop experience has just begun, we already have the first statistics from the United States telling us which products are most appreciated and purchased by TikTok users.\n\nThe Beauty and Personal Care sector is decidedly the most appreciated, representing 22.5% of the entire market share. Women\u2019s Clothing and Intimates is the second most purchased category through TikTok Shop, accounting for 12.5% of purchases, while Men\u2019s Clothing and Intimates ranks third, with a preference rate of 8%.\n\nAs is already the case on Instagram, on TikTok, the female target audience appears to be the most responsive to the allure of social shopping.\n\nDo you want to sell online or are you looking for someone to boost your sales?\n\n####    \nDiscuss it with Matteo!\n\nMatteo Doveri Account Executive\n\n\u30107\u2020Book a meeting\u3011\n\n#### Continua a leggere \n\n4 minutes of reading\n\n[Image 5: Environment, the hidden CO2 emissions of the Internet][Image 6: Environment, the hidden CO2 emissions of", "pub_date": null, "extra": {"cited_message_idx": 8, "search_result_idx": null, "evidence_text": "source", "cloud_doc_url": null}}}, {"start_ix": 475, "end_ix": 485, "citation_format_type": "tether_og", "metadata": {"type": "webpage", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "text": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. TikTok Shop e le Presentazioni non sono uguali.\n\n     * Se hai soltanto una Vetrina e non un TikTok Shop, puoi comunque fare pubblicit\u00e0 utilizzando i prodotti nella tua vetrina e fare riferimento a \u30103\u2020Come configurare Video Shopping Ads con Vetrina\u3011.\n\n     * Se scegli Vetrina o TikTok Shop come origine prodotto, l\u2019elenco dei prodotti che possono essere selezionati per la pubblicit\u00e0 cambia di conseguenza.\n\n     * Ricordati che TikTok Shop contiene l\u2019inventario dei prodotti di propriet\u00e0 del venditore. Se vendi i prodotti attraverso un account affiliato o di marketing, \u00e8 possibile che tu possieda un TikTok Shop.\n\n  2. Da notare che non tutti coloro che possiedono una Vetrina hanno un TikTok Shop.\n\n     * Ad esempio, un brand pu\u00f2 concedere a un terzo l\u2019autorizzazione a vendere prodotti a suo nome. Questi prodotti sono visualizzati nella Vetrina del terzo per essere acquistati dai clienti. Un terzo non possiede i prodotti che vende, ma piuttosto vende i prodotti per conto del brand.\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere per utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\nPossedere una Vetrina non significa necessariamente possedere un TikTok Shop. Gli esempi che seguono mostrano i diversi scenari che si verificano tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina.\n\n### Esempi \n\n  1. Per un account TikTok ufficiale, tutti i prodotti di un brand verranno automaticamente visualizzati nella loro Vetrina.\n\n  2. Un brand pu\u00f2 consentire agli account commerciali/affiliati di vendere i prodotti per suo conto. La Vetrina degli account commerciali/affiliati visualizzer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un negozio.\n\n     * Esempio 1: un brand di calzature pu\u00f2 consentire a pi\u00f9 account commerciali, gestiti da terzi, di vendere prodotti a suo nome.\n\n     * Esempio 2: due brand diversi di calzature possono consentire a un account affiliato/di marketing gestito da un importante rivenditore al dettaglio o da uno store specializzato di vendere prodotti per conto di entrambi i brand.\n\n## Come utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina\n\n### Come account TikTok ufficiale \n\nSe sei un account TikTok ufficiale con un TikTok Shop, la tua Vetrina mostrer\u00e0 tutti i tuoi prodotti.\n\n##### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok ufficiale. Dopo che il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok ha confermato il link, tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop vengono automaticamente visualizzati nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese in cui vende lo shop. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30109\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301010\u2020Stati Uniti\u2020seller-us.tiktok.com\u3011 e \u301011\u2020Vietnam\u2020seller-vn.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\n  * Ciascun TikTok Shop pu\u00f2 disporre di 1 solo account TikTok ufficiale.\n\n  * Ciascun account TikTok pu\u00f2 essere collegato a 1 solo TikTok Shop come account TikTok ufficiale. Un account TikTok ufficiale non pu\u00f2 essere collegato ad altri TikTok Shop.\n\n### Come account TikTok per il marketing \n\nLa tua vetrina mostrer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un brand.\n\n#### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok per il marketing. Dopo aver confermato il link, il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok pu\u00f2 selezionare alcuni o tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop per mostrarli nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301012\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301013\u2020St", "pub_date": null, "extra": {"cited_message_idx": 9, "search_result_idx": null, "evidence_text": "source", "cloud_doc_url": null}}}], "content_references": [{"matched_text": "\u30108\u2020source\u3011", "start_idx": 465, "end_idx": 475, "alt": null, "type": "webpage_extended", "title": "TikTok Shop also arrives in Europe. "8d3e82cb4e203750-MXP", "message_source": null, "timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "f4ec6c96-662e-4b67-9f5a-473fbd6954df", "children": ["0242d357-d2ff-4de7-9711-98422bde3baa"]}, "0242d357-d2ff-4de7-9711-98422bde3baa": {"id": "0242d357-d2ff-4de7-9711-98422bde3baa", "message": {"id": "0242d357-d2ff-4de7-9711-98422bde3baa", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1729149482.864649, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Opening a TikTok Shop involves a few key steps, which allow businesses or creators to sell products directly within the app. Here&#x27;s a breakdown of the process:\n\n1. **Create a TikTok Business Account**: If you don\u2019t already have one, you\u2019ll need to sign up for a TikTok Business account. This account will be essential for managing your shop and linking products to your videos.\n\n2. **Register for TikTok Shop**:\n   - Visit the **TikTok Seller Center** and sign up as a seller.\n   - You\u2019ll need to provide business information such as your company name, address, and tax ID, as well as proof of identity.\n   - Some countries may have specific requirements or limitations, so ensure you meet those for your region.\n\n3. **Set Up Your Product Inventory**:\n   - Once registered, you can upload your products directly to the TikTok Shop.\n   - Ensure that all product descriptions, prices, and photos are optimized for visibility. TikTok encourages sellers to upload as many products as possible to increase exposure\u301010\u2020source\u3011.\n\n4. **Link Products to TikTok Content**:\n   - You can link products to your videos, live streams, and even your TikTok profile\u2019s shop tab. This makes it easy for users to shop directly from the content they\u2019re viewing.\n   - You can also use TikTok\u2019s tools to create **Shoppable Videos** and **Live Shopping** events, where viewers can purchase items in real time\u30109\u2020source\u3011\u301011\u2020source\u3011.\n\n5. **Promote Your Shop**:\n   - Utilize TikTok\u2019s marketing tools, such as **Video Shopping Ads** and collaborations with creators via the **Affiliate Program**, to maximize product visibility.\n   - Consistently post content featuring your products and encourage engagement to attract more customers\u301010\u2020source\u3011\u30109\u2020source\u3011.\n\nBy following these steps, you&#x27;ll have a fully operational TikTok Shop that integrates with your content and allows users to purchase directly from within the app."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"citations": [{"start_ix": 1009, "end_ix": 1020, "citation_format_type": "tether_og", "metadata": {"type": "webpage", "title": "Business Help Center", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en", "text": "\nURL: https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en\n\u30100\u2020 Business Help Center\u3011 \n\n\u30101\u2020Create an Ad\u3011\n\n[Image 0] \n\nConsiderations when launching your TikTok Shop Journey\n\nLast updated, May 2024 \n\nTikTok Shop is now available in the following markets: Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam.\n\nYou can directly create your TikTok Shop at \u30102\u2020TikTok Seller Center\u2020seller.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\nAfter creating your TikTok Shop, start your marketing and sales efforts with these recommended steps. \n\n1. Maximize the products uploaded to TikTok Shop (TTS). Do not only upload your bestselling products or products that you believe will sell well on TikTok Shop. We strongly recommend uploading all products available to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n2. Maximize the number of Shoppable Video posts on your TikTok account. Do not only upload videos that have performed well on other platforms or that you believe will perform well on TikTok. Uploading videos on TikTok requires no additional costs. We strongly recommend posting as many videos as possible on your TikTok account to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n3. Add TikTok Shop Product Link (the little orange cart) to all relevant videos on your TikTok account. While it is best practice to ensure the linked product matches the video content, it is more important to have a TikTok Shop Product Link on as many video posts as possible.\n\n4. Participate in the open affiliate plan. You may participate in the targeted plan if you are already familiar with creators and have an existing creator pipeline. Tips on commission rate: If no benchmarks have been set before, we recommend starting with a 10% commission rate, and gradually reducing it to 5% or 1% as your TikTok Shop GMV grows.\n\n5. Start with \u30103\u2020Video Shopping Ads\u3011 (VSA) for TikTok Shop, prioritizing existing videos from your TikTok account that have already generated organic conversions (Spark Ads). Note that when using an existing video as an asset for Video Shopping Ads, the Video Shopping Ads will use the products chosen during ad creation in the ad link. You can choose to advertise the same or different list of products for the Video Shopping Ads vs. the organic link. You can even run a Video Shopping Ads with an existing video that has no organic link.\n\n6. If using new videos as an asset for Video Shopping Ads through TikTok Ads Manager (not using Spark Ads), we recommend posting the video with the TikTok Shop Product Link on your TikTok account first, unless you are testing multiple variations of video captions, for which you may choose ads-only mode for some of the ads.\n\n7. Try to acquire affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you and/or have high GPM (GMV per impression) as ad creatives assets. Obtain the video code from the affiliate creator. You can see all affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you in the affiliate section of Seller Center and directly message the creator from Seller Center via Creator Connect.\n\n8. Try to use as many videos and/or TikTok Shop Product Links as possible under the same VSA ad group budget, ideally with 3-5 active video creatives in each ad group. Use the highest gross revenue and cost cap bid strategies according to preference and experiment with a combination of these two bid strategies. Experiment with using single product links (only one product per ad) and multiple product links (multiple products per ad) to test what works better for your business, as results may vary for different sellers.\n\n9. For the highest gross revenue ad group, keep scaling the budget every week, each time observing the ROAS of the previous 7 days on a rolling basis, and increase or decrease the budget as necessary. For cost cap, we recommend maximizing the budget after the ad has run for more than a day.\n\n10. Besides the 1 official TikTok account connected to your TikTok Shop, you can additionally connect up to 4 more TikTok accounts with your TikTok Shop for marketing purposes. Take advantage of this by differentiating your marketing accounts based on persona categories to cater to different audience preferences, presenting &quot;UGC&quot; style native content. This helps to broaden your interested audiences.\n\n11. If you are running a LIVE Shopping event, we highly recommend running \u30104\u2020Live Shopping Ads\u3011 (LSA), optimizing towards Gross Revenue, and starting with a budget of a few hundred dollars. LIVE Shopping events or LSA may or may not work well for your business. LIVE Shopping performance can be volatile but can work well for some businesses.\n\n12. TikTok Shop does not only offer ads GMV but also trackable organic GMV. It also offers a potentially large pool of &quot;referral&quot; style affiliate creatives that you can use for ads or other purposes.\n\n13. When considering Shop Ads performance, in addition to reviewing Shop Ads ROAS performance, we recommend reviewing overall TikTok Shop marketing ROI, which equates to [Shop total GMV / (Shop Ads ads cost + Shop affiliate commission)]. Consider how much GMV (paid, affiliate, organic) you are getting out of your marketing investment in TikTok Shop. Evaluate your TikTok Shop marketing ROI against your typical marketing ROI targets.\n\nContent Hide content \n\nOur Products\n\n* \u30105\u2020TikTok for Business\u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30106\u2020TikTok\u2020tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30107\u2020Creative Center\u3011\n\n\u30100\u2020 \u3011 \n\n\u00a92024 TikTok For Business \n\n* \u30108\u2020 Terms &amp; Policies \u3011\n* \u30109\u2020 Privacy \u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30100\u2020 Help \u3011\nVisible: 0% - 100%", "pub_date": null, "extra": {"cited_message_idx": 10, "search_result_idx": null, "evidence_text": "source", "cloud_doc_url": null}}}, {"start_ix": 1384, "end_ix": 1394, "citation_format_type": "tether_og", "metadata": {"type": "webpage", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "text": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. TikTok Shop e le Presentazioni non sono uguali.\n\n     * Se hai soltanto una Vetrina e non un TikTok Shop, puoi comunque fare pubblicit\u00e0 utilizzando i prodotti nella tua vetrina e fare riferimento a \u30103\u2020Come configurare Video Shopping Ads con Vetrina\u3011.\n\n     * Se scegli Vetrina o TikTok Shop come origine prodotto, l\u2019elenco dei prodotti che possono essere selezionati per la pubblicit\u00e0 cambia di conseguenza.\n\n     * Ricordati che TikTok Shop contiene l\u2019inventario dei prodotti di propriet\u00e0 del venditore. Se vendi i prodotti attraverso un account affiliato o di marketing, \u00e8 possibile che tu possieda un TikTok Shop.\n\n  2. Da notare che non tutti coloro che possiedono una Vetrina hanno un TikTok Shop.\n\n     * Ad esempio, un brand pu\u00f2 concedere a un terzo l\u2019autorizzazione a vendere prodotti a suo nome. Questi prodotti sono visualizzati nella Vetrina del terzo per essere acquistati dai clienti. Un terzo non possiede i prodotti che vende, ma piuttosto vende i prodotti per conto del brand.\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere per utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\nPossedere una Vetrina non significa necessariamente possedere un TikTok Shop. Gli esempi che seguono mostrano i diversi scenari che si verificano tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina.\n\n### Esempi \n\n  1. Per un account TikTok ufficiale, tutti i prodotti di un brand verranno automaticamente visualizzati nella loro Vetrina.\n\n  2. Un brand pu\u00f2 consentire agli account commerciali/affiliati di vendere i prodotti per suo conto. La Vetrina degli account commerciali/affiliati visualizzer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un negozio.\n\n     * Esempio 1: un brand di calzature pu\u00f2 consentire a pi\u00f9 account commerciali, gestiti da terzi, di vendere prodotti a suo nome.\n\n     * Esempio 2: due brand diversi di calzature possono consentire a un account affiliato/di marketing gestito da un importante rivenditore al dettaglio o da uno store specializzato di vendere prodotti per conto di entrambi i brand.\n\n## Come utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina\n\n### Come account TikTok ufficiale \n\nSe sei un account TikTok ufficiale con un TikTok Shop, la tua Vetrina mostrer\u00e0 tutti i tuoi prodotti.\n\n##### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok ufficiale. Dopo che il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok ha confermato il link, tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop vengono automaticamente visualizzati nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese in cui vende lo shop. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30109\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301010\u2020Stati Uniti\u2020seller-us.tiktok.com\u3011 e \u301011\u2020Vietnam\u2020seller-vn.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\n  * Ciascun TikTok Shop pu\u00f2 disporre di 1 solo account TikTok ufficiale.\n\n  * Ciascun account TikTok pu\u00f2 essere collegato a 1 solo TikTok Shop come account TikTok ufficiale. Un account TikTok ufficiale non pu\u00f2 essere collegato ad altri TikTok Shop.\n\n### Come account TikTok per il marketing \n\nLa tua vetrina mostrer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un brand.\n\n#### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok per il marketing. Dopo aver confermato il link, il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok pu\u00f2 selezionare alcuni o tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop per mostrarli nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301012\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301013\u2020St", "pub_date": null, "extra": {"cited_message_idx": 9, "search_result_idx": null, "evidence_text": "source", "cloud_doc_url": null}}},
