"Business Help Center", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en", "text": "\nURL: https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en\n\u30100\u2020 Business Help Center\u3011 \n\n\u30101\u2020Create an Ad\u3011\n\n[Image 0] \n\nConsiderations when launching your TikTok Shop Journey\n\nLast updated, May 2024 \n\nTikTok Shop is now available in the following markets: Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam.\n\nYou can directly create your TikTok Shop at \u30102\u2020TikTok Seller Center\u2020seller.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\nAfter creating your TikTok Shop, start your marketing and sales efforts with these recommended steps. \n\n1. Maximize the products uploaded to TikTok Shop (TTS). Do not only upload your bestselling products or products that you believe will sell well on TikTok Shop. We strongly recommend uploading all products available to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n2. Maximize the number of Shoppable Video posts on your TikTok account. Do not only upload videos that have performed well on other platforms or that you believe will perform well on TikTok. Uploading videos on TikTok requires no additional costs. We strongly recommend posting as many videos as possible on your TikTok account to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n3. Add TikTok Shop Product Link (the little orange cart) to all relevant videos on your TikTok account. While it is best practice to ensure the linked product matches the video content, it is more important to have a TikTok Shop Product Link on as many video posts as possible.\n\n4. Participate in the open affiliate plan. You may participate in the targeted plan if you are already familiar with creators and have an existing creator pipeline. Tips on commission rate: If no benchmarks have been set before, we recommend starting with a 10% commission rate, and gradually reducing it to 5% or 1% as your TikTok Shop GMV grows.\n\n5. Start with \u30103\u2020Video Shopping Ads\u3011 (VSA) for TikTok Shop, prioritizing existing videos from your TikTok account that have already generated organic conversions (Spark Ads). Note that when using an existing video as an asset for Video Shopping Ads, the Video Shopping Ads will use the products chosen during ad creation in the ad link. You can choose to advertise the same or different list of products for the Video Shopping Ads vs. the organic link. You can even run a Video Shopping Ads with an existing video that has no organic link.\n\n6. If using new videos as an asset for Video Shopping Ads through TikTok Ads Manager (not using Spark Ads), we recommend posting the video with the TikTok Shop Product Link on your TikTok account first, unless you are testing multiple variations of video captions, for which you may choose ads-only mode for some of the ads.\n\n7. Try to acquire affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you and/or have high GPM (GMV per impression) as ad creatives assets. Obtain the video code from the affiliate creator. You can see all affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you in the affiliate section of Seller Center and directly message the creator from Seller Center via Creator Connect.\n\n8. Try to use as many videos and/or TikTok Shop Product Links as possible under the same VSA ad group budget, ideally with 3-5 active video creatives in each ad group. Use the highest gross revenue and cost cap bid strategies according to preference and experiment with a combination of these two bid strategies. Experiment with using single product links (only one product per ad) and multiple product links (multiple products per ad) to test what works better for your business, as results may vary for different sellers.\n\n9. For the highest gross revenue ad group, keep scaling the budget every week, each time observing the ROAS of the previous 7 days on a rolling basis, and increase or decrease the budget as necessary. For cost cap, we recommend maximizing the budget after the ad has run for more than a day.\n\n10. Besides the 1 official TikTok account connected to your TikTok Shop, you can additionally connect up to 4 more TikTok accounts with your TikTok Shop for marketing purposes. Take advantage of this by differentiating your marketing accounts based on persona categories to cater to different audience preferences, presenting &quot;UGC&quot; style native content. This helps to broaden your interested audiences.\n\n11. If you are running a LIVE Shopping event, we highly recommend running \u30104\u2020Live Shopping Ads\u3011 (LSA), optimizing towards Gross Revenue, and starting with a budget of a few hundred dollars. LIVE Shopping events or LSA may or may not work well for your business. LIVE Shopping performance can be volatile but can work well for some businesses.\n\n12. TikTok Shop does not only offer ads GMV but also trackable organic GMV. It also offers a potentially large pool of &quot;referral&quot; style affiliate creatives that you can use for ads or other purposes.\n\n13. When considering Shop Ads performance, in addition to reviewing Shop Ads ROAS performance, we recommend reviewing overall TikTok Shop marketing ROI, which equates to [Shop total GMV / (Shop Ads ads cost + Shop affiliate commission)]. Consider how much GMV (paid, affiliate, organic) you are getting out of your marketing investment in TikTok Shop. Evaluate your TikTok Shop marketing ROI against your typical marketing ROI targets.\n\nContent Hide content \n\nOur Products\n\n* \u30105\u2020TikTok for Business\u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30106\u2020TikTok\u2020tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30107\u2020Creative Center\u3011\n\n\u30100\u2020 \u3011 \n\n\u00a92024 TikTok For Business \n\n* \u30108\u2020 Terms &amp; Policies \u3011\n* \u30109\u2020 Privacy \u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30100\u2020 Help \u3011\nVisible: 0% - 100%", "pub_date": null, "extra": {"cited_message_idx": 10, "search_result_idx": null, "evidence_text": "source", "cloud_doc_url": null}}}, {"start_ix": 1716, "end_ix": 1726, "citation_format_type": "tether_og", "metadata": {"type": "webpage", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "text": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. TikTok Shop e le Presentazioni non sono uguali.\n\n     * Se hai soltanto una Vetrina e non un TikTok Shop, puoi comunque fare pubblicit\u00e0 utilizzando i prodotti nella tua vetrina e fare riferimento a \u30103\u2020Come configurare Video Shopping Ads con Vetrina\u3011.\n\n     * Se scegli Vetrina o TikTok Shop come origine prodotto, l\u2019elenco dei prodotti che possono essere selezionati per la pubblicit\u00e0 cambia di conseguenza.\n\n     * Ricordati che TikTok Shop contiene l\u2019inventario dei prodotti di propriet\u00e0 del venditore. Se vendi i prodotti attraverso un account affiliato o di marketing, \u00e8 possibile che tu possieda un TikTok Shop.\n\n  2. Da notare che non tutti coloro che possiedono una Vetrina hanno un TikTok Shop.\n\n     * Ad esempio, un brand pu\u00f2 concedere a un terzo l\u2019autorizzazione a vendere prodotti a suo nome. Questi prodotti sono visualizzati nella Vetrina del terzo per essere acquistati dai clienti. Un terzo non possiede i prodotti che vende, ma piuttosto vende i prodotti per conto del brand.\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere per utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\nPossedere una Vetrina non significa necessariamente possedere un TikTok Shop. Gli esempi che seguono mostrano i diversi scenari che si verificano tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina.\n\n### Esempi \n\n  1. Per un account TikTok ufficiale, tutti i prodotti di un brand verranno automaticamente visualizzati nella loro Vetrina.\n\n  2. Un brand pu\u00f2 consentire agli account commerciali/affiliati di vendere i prodotti per suo conto. La Vetrina degli account commerciali/affiliati visualizzer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un negozio.\n\n     * Esempio 1: un brand di calzature pu\u00f2 consentire a pi\u00f9 account commerciali, gestiti da terzi, di vendere prodotti a suo nome.\n\n     * Esempio 2: due brand diversi di calzature possono consentire a un account affiliato/di marketing gestito da un importante rivenditore al dettaglio o da uno store specializzato di vendere prodotti per conto di entrambi i brand.\n\n## Come utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina\n\n### Come account TikTok ufficiale \n\nSe sei un account TikTok ufficiale con un TikTok Shop, la tua Vetrina mostrer\u00e0 tutti i tuoi prodotti.\n\n##### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok ufficiale. Dopo che il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok ha confermato il link, tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop vengono automaticamente visualizzati nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese in cui vende lo shop. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30109\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301010\u2020Stati Uniti\u2020seller-us.tiktok.com\u3011 e \u301011\u2020Vietnam\u2020seller-vn.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\n  * Ciascun TikTok Shop pu\u00f2 disporre di 1 solo account TikTok ufficiale.\n\n  * Ciascun account TikTok pu\u00f2 essere collegato a 1 solo TikTok Shop come account TikTok ufficiale. Un account TikTok ufficiale non pu\u00f2 essere collegato ad altri TikTok Shop.\n\n### Come account TikTok per il marketing \n\nLa tua vetrina mostrer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un brand.\n\n#### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok per il marketing. Dopo aver confermato il link, il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok pu\u00f2 selezionare alcuni o tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop per mostrarli nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301012\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301013\u2020St", "pub_date": null, "extra": {"cited_message_idx": 9, "search_result_idx": null, "evidence_text": "source", "cloud_doc_url": null}}}], "content_references": [{"matched_text": "\u301010\u2020source\u3011", "start_idx": 1009, "end_idx": 1020, "alt": null, "type": "webpage_extended", "title": "Business Help Center", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en", "pub_date": null, "snippet": "\nURL: https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en\n\u30100\u2020 Business Help Center\u3011 \n\n\u30101\u2020Create an Ad\u3011\n\n[Image 0] \n\nConsiderations when launching your TikTok Shop Journey\n\nLast updated, May 2024 \n\nTikTok Shop is now available in the following markets: Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam.\n\nYou can directly create your TikTok Shop at \u30102\u2020TikTok Seller Center\u2020seller.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\nAfter creating your TikTok Shop, start your marketing and sales efforts with these recommended steps. \n\n1. Maximize the products uploaded to TikTok Shop (TTS). Do not only upload your bestselling products or products that you believe will sell well on TikTok Shop. We strongly recommend uploading all products available to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n2. Maximize the number of Shoppable Video posts on your TikTok account. Do not only upload videos that have performed well on other platforms or that you believe will perform well on TikTok. Uploading videos on TikTok requires no additional costs. We strongly recommend posting as many videos as possible on your TikTok account to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n3. Add TikTok Shop Product Link (the little orange cart) to all relevant videos on your TikTok account. While it is best practice to ensure the linked product matches the video content, it is more important to have a TikTok Shop Product Link on as many video posts as possible.\n\n4. Participate in the open affiliate plan. You may participate in the targeted plan if you are already familiar with creators and have an existing creator pipeline. Tips on commission rate: If no benchmarks have been set before, we recommend starting with a 10% commission rate, and gradually reducing it to 5% or 1% as your TikTok Shop GMV grows.\n\n5. Start with \u30103\u2020Video Shopping Ads\u3011 (VSA) for TikTok Shop, prioritizing existing videos from your TikTok account that have already generated organic conversions (Spark Ads). Note that when using an existing video as an asset for Video Shopping Ads, the Video Shopping Ads will use the products chosen during ad creation in the ad link. You can choose to advertise the same or different list of products for the Video Shopping Ads vs. the organic link. You can even run a Video Shopping Ads with an existing video that has no organic link.\n\n6. If using new videos as an asset for Video Shopping Ads through TikTok Ads Manager (not using Spark Ads), we recommend posting the video with the TikTok Shop Product Link on your TikTok account first, unless you are testing multiple variations of video captions, for which you may choose ads-only mode for some of the ads.\n\n7. Try to acquire affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you and/or have high GPM (GMV per impression) as ad creatives assets. Obtain the video code from the affiliate creator. You can see all affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you in the affiliate section of Seller Center and directly message the creator from Seller Center via Creator Connect.\n\n8. Try to use as many videos and/or TikTok Shop Product Links as possible under the same VSA ad group budget, ideally with 3-5 active video creatives in each ad group. Use the highest gross revenue and cost cap bid strategies according to preference and experiment with a combination of these two bid strategies. Experiment with using single product links (only one product per ad) and multiple product links (multiple products per ad) to test what works better for your business, as results may vary for different sellers.\n\n9. For the highest gross revenue ad group, keep scaling the budget every week, each time observing the ROAS of the previous 7 days on a rolling basis, and increase or decrease the budget as necessary. For cost cap, we recommend maximizing the budget after the ad has run for more than a day.\n\n10. Besides the 1 official TikTok account connected to your TikTok Shop, you can additionally connect up to 4 more TikTok accounts with your TikTok Shop for marketing purposes. Take advantage of this by differentiating your marketing accounts based on persona categories to cater to different audience preferences, presenting &quot;UGC&quot; style native content. This helps to broaden your interested audiences.\n\n11. If you are running a LIVE Shopping event, we highly recommend running \u30104\u2020Live Shopping Ads\u3011 (LSA), optimizing towards Gross Revenue, and starting with a budget of a few hundred dollars. LIVE Shopping events or LSA may or may not work well for your business. LIVE Shopping performance can be volatile but can work well for some businesses.\n\n12. TikTok Shop does not only offer ads GMV but also trackable organic GMV. It also offers a potentially large pool of &quot;referral&quot; style affiliate creatives that you can use for ads or other purposes.\n\n13. When considering Shop Ads performance, in addition to reviewing Shop Ads ROAS performance, we recommend reviewing overall TikTok Shop marketing ROI, which equates to [Shop total GMV / (Shop Ads ads cost + Shop affiliate commission)]. Consider how much GMV (paid, affiliate, organic) you are getting out of your marketing investment in TikTok Shop. Evaluate your TikTok Shop marketing ROI against your typical marketing ROI targets.\n\nContent Hide content \n\nOur Products\n\n* \u30105\u2020TikTok for Business\u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30106\u2020TikTok\u2020tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30107\u2020Creative Center\u3011\n\n\u30100\u2020 \u3011 \n\n\u00a92024 TikTok For Business \n\n* \u30108\u2020 Terms &amp; Policies \u3011\n* \u30109\u2020 Privacy \u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30100\u2020 Help \u3011\nVisible: 0% - 100%"}, {"matched_text": "\u30109\u2020source\u3011", "start_idx": 1384, "end_idx": 1394, "alt": null, "type": "webpage_extended", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "pub_date": null, "snippet": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. weekly.\n\nEmail address  First Name Last Name\n\nCompany (optional) \u3010142\u2020I read and agreed to Terms &amp; Conditions\u3011 \n\nLeave this field empty if you&#x27;re human: \n\n[Image 32: Cross-Border Commerce Europe EU]  \nThe Business Accelerator for the Cross-Border Retail Industry in Europe.\n\n  * \u30104\u2020Home\u3011\n  * \u301068\u2020About\u3011\n  * \u301076\u2020FAQ\u3011\n  * \u301077\u2020Contact\u3011\n  * \u3010143\u2020Sitemap\u3011\n  * \u3010"}, {"matched_text": "\u301010\u2020source\u3011", "start_idx": 1705, "end_idx": 1716, "alt": null, "type": "webpage_extended", "title": "Business Help Center", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en", "pub_date": null, "snippet": "\nURL: https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/considerations-when-launching-your-tiktok-shop-journey?lang=en\n\u30100\u2020 Business Help Center\u3011 \n\n\u30101\u2020Create an Ad\u3011\n\n[Image 0] \n\nConsiderations when launching your TikTok Shop Journey\n\nLast updated, May 2024 \n\nTikTok Shop is now available in the following markets: Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam.\n\nYou can directly create your TikTok Shop at \u30102\u2020TikTok Seller Center\u2020seller.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\nAfter creating your TikTok Shop, start your marketing and sales efforts with these recommended steps. \n\n1. Maximize the products uploaded to TikTok Shop (TTS). Do not only upload your bestselling products or products that you believe will sell well on TikTok Shop. We strongly recommend uploading all products available to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n2. Maximize the number of Shoppable Video posts on your TikTok account. Do not only upload videos that have performed well on other platforms or that you believe will perform well on TikTok. Uploading videos on TikTok requires no additional costs. We strongly recommend posting as many videos as possible on your TikTok account to help increase exposure among potential shoppers.\n\n3. Add TikTok Shop Product Link (the little orange cart) to all relevant videos on your TikTok account. While it is best practice to ensure the linked product matches the video content, it is more important to have a TikTok Shop Product Link on as many video posts as possible.\n\n4. Participate in the open affiliate plan. You may participate in the targeted plan if you are already familiar with creators and have an existing creator pipeline. Tips on commission rate: If no benchmarks have been set before, we recommend starting with a 10% commission rate, and gradually reducing it to 5% or 1% as your TikTok Shop GMV grows.\n\n5. Start with \u30103\u2020Video Shopping Ads\u3011 (VSA) for TikTok Shop, prioritizing existing videos from your TikTok account that have already generated organic conversions (Spark Ads). Note that when using an existing video as an asset for Video Shopping Ads, the Video Shopping Ads will use the products chosen during ad creation in the ad link. You can choose to advertise the same or different list of products for the Video Shopping Ads vs. the organic link. You can even run a Video Shopping Ads with an existing video that has no organic link.\n\n6. If using new videos as an asset for Video Shopping Ads through TikTok Ads Manager (not using Spark Ads), we recommend posting the video with the TikTok Shop Product Link on your TikTok account first, unless you are testing multiple variations of video captions, for which you may choose ads-only mode for some of the ads.\n\n7. Try to acquire affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you and/or have high GPM (GMV per impression) as ad creatives assets. Obtain the video code from the affiliate creator. You can see all affiliate videos that have been generating GMV for you in the affiliate section of Seller Center and directly message the creator from Seller Center via Creator Connect.\n\n8. Try to use as many videos and/or TikTok Shop Product Links as possible under the same VSA ad group budget, ideally with 3-5 active video creatives in each ad group. Use the highest gross revenue and cost cap bid strategies according to preference and experiment with a combination of these two bid strategies. Experiment with using single product links (only one product per ad) and multiple product links (multiple products per ad) to test what works better for your business, as results may vary for different sellers.\n\n9. For the highest gross revenue ad group, keep scaling the budget every week, each time observing the ROAS of the previous 7 days on a rolling basis, and increase or decrease the budget as necessary. For cost cap, we recommend maximizing the budget after the ad has run for more than a day.\n\n10. Besides the 1 official TikTok account connected to your TikTok Shop, you can additionally connect up to 4 more TikTok accounts with your TikTok Shop for marketing purposes. Take advantage of this by differentiating your marketing accounts based on persona categories to cater to different audience preferences, presenting &quot;UGC&quot; style native content. This helps to broaden your interested audiences.\n\n11. If you are running a LIVE Shopping event, we highly recommend running \u30104\u2020Live Shopping Ads\u3011 (LSA), optimizing towards Gross Revenue, and starting with a budget of a few hundred dollars. LIVE Shopping events or LSA may or may not work well for your business. LIVE Shopping performance can be volatile but can work well for some businesses.\n\n12. TikTok Shop does not only offer ads GMV but also trackable organic GMV. It also offers a potentially large pool of &quot;referral&quot; style affiliate creatives that you can use for ads or other purposes.\n\n13. When considering Shop Ads performance, in addition to reviewing Shop Ads ROAS performance, we recommend reviewing overall TikTok Shop marketing ROI, which equates to [Shop total GMV / (Shop Ads ads cost + Shop affiliate commission)]. Consider how much GMV (paid, affiliate, organic) you are getting out of your marketing investment in TikTok Shop. Evaluate your TikTok Shop marketing ROI against your typical marketing ROI targets.\n\nContent Hide content \n\nOur Products\n\n* \u30105\u2020TikTok for Business\u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30106\u2020TikTok\u2020tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30107\u2020Creative Center\u3011\n\n\u30100\u2020 \u3011 \n\n\u00a92024 TikTok For Business \n\n* \u30108\u2020 Terms &amp; Policies \u3011\n* \u30109\u2020 Privacy \u2020www.tiktok.com\u3011\n* \u30100\u2020 Help \u3011\nVisible: 0% - 100%"}, {"matched_text": "\u30109\u2020source\u3011", "start_idx": 1716, "end_idx": 1726, "alt": null, "type": "webpage_extended", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "pub_date": null, "snippet": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. TikTok Shop e le Presentazioni non sono uguali.\n\n     * Se hai soltanto una Vetrina e non un TikTok Shop, puoi comunque fare pubblicit\u00e0 utilizzando i prodotti nella tua vetrina e fare riferimento a \u30103\u2020Come configurare Video Shopping Ads con Vetrina\u3011.\n\n     * Se scegli Vetrina o TikTok Shop come origine prodotto, l\u2019elenco dei prodotti che possono essere selezionati per la pubblicit\u00e0 cambia di conseguenza.\n\n     * Ricordati che TikTok Shop contiene l\u2019inventario dei prodotti di propriet\u00e0 del venditore. Se vendi i prodotti attraverso un account affiliato o di marketing, \u00e8 possibile che tu possieda un TikTok Shop.\n\n  2. Da notare che non tutti coloro che possiedono una Vetrina hanno un TikTok Shop.\n\n     * Ad esempio, un brand pu\u00f2 concedere a un terzo l\u2019autorizzazione a vendere prodotti a suo nome. Questi prodotti sono visualizzati nella Vetrina del terzo per essere acquistati dai clienti. Un terzo non possiede i prodotti che vende, ma piuttosto vende i prodotti per conto del brand.\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere per utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\nPossedere una Vetrina non significa necessariamente possedere un TikTok Shop. Gli esempi che seguono mostrano i diversi scenari che si verificano tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina.\n\n### Esempi \n\n  1. Per un account TikTok ufficiale, tutti i prodotti di un brand verranno automaticamente visualizzati nella loro Vetrina.\n\n  2. Un brand pu\u00f2 consentire agli account commerciali/affiliati di vendere i prodotti per suo conto. La Vetrina degli account commerciali/affiliati visualizzer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un negozio.\n\n     * Esempio 1: un brand di calzature pu\u00f2 consentire a pi\u00f9 account commerciali, gestiti da terzi, di vendere prodotti a suo nome.\n\n     * Esempio 2: due brand diversi di calzature possono consentire a un account affiliato/di marketing gestito da un importante rivenditore al dettaglio o da uno store specializzato di vendere prodotti per conto di entrambi i brand.\n\n## Come utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina\n\n### Come account TikTok ufficiale \n\nSe sei un account TikTok ufficiale con un TikTok Shop, la tua Vetrina mostrer\u00e0 tutti i tuoi prodotti.\n\n##### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok ufficiale. Dopo che il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok ha confermato il link, tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop vengono automaticamente visualizzati nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese in cui vende lo shop. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30109\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301010\u2020Stati Uniti\u2020seller-us.tiktok.com\u3011 e \u301011\u2020Vietnam\u2020seller-vn.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\n  * Ciascun TikTok Shop pu\u00f2 disporre di 1 solo account TikTok ufficiale.\n\n  * Ciascun account TikTok pu\u00f2 essere collegato a 1 solo TikTok Shop come account TikTok ufficiale. Un account TikTok ufficiale non pu\u00f2 essere collegato ad altri TikTok Shop.\n\n### Come account TikTok per il marketing \n\nLa tua vetrina mostrer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un brand.\n\n#### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok per il marketing. Dopo aver confermato il link, il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok pu\u00f2 selezionare alcuni o tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop per mostrarli nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301012\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301013\u2020St"}], "gizmo_id": null, "message_type": null, "model_slug": "gpt-4o", "default_model_slug": "gpt-4o", "parent_id": "4d150dad-1e84-4434-932c-392ce8075487", "request_id": "8d3e82cb4e203750-MXP", "timestamp_": "absolute", "finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop_tokens": [200002]}, "is_complete": true}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "4d150dad-1e84-4434-932c-392ce8075487", "children": ["969ceb7e-ca06-4db1-8498-7c178d3a4d78"]}, "969ceb7e-ca06-4db1-8498-7c178d3a4d78": {"id": "969ceb7e-ca06-4db1-8498-7c178d3a4d78", "message": {"id": "969ceb7e-ca06-4db1-8498-7c178d3a4d78", "author": {"role": "user", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1729149553.978416, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Is there a follower requirement?"]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"request_id": "8d3e84e6faeb3750-MXP", "message_source": null, "timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "0242d357-d2ff-4de7-9711-98422bde3baa", "children": ["9e95b03c-9ffb-49c8-bdc4-90db10cf444d"]}, "9e95b03c-9ffb-49c8-bdc4-90db10cf444d": {"id": "9e95b03c-9ffb-49c8-bdc4-90db10cf444d", "message": {"id": "9e95b03c-9ffb-49c8-bdc4-90db10cf444d", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1729149562.841878, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Yes, there is a follower requirement to open a TikTok Shop. Typically, businesses or creators must have a certain number of followers to be eligible to sell directly on TikTok, which varies by country and region. In many regions, TikTok requires accounts to have a minimum of 1,000 followers before enabling the shopping features, though this threshold can differ based on promotional campaigns or changes in policy.\n\nAdditionally, TikTok may have other criteria, such as account age, activity level, and adherence to community guidelines, that influence eligibility\u30109\u2020source\u3011\u301011\u2020source\u3011. Dopo che il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok ha confermato il link, tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop vengono automaticamente visualizzati nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese in cui vende lo shop. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30109\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301010\u2020Stati Uniti\u2020seller-us.tiktok.com\u3011 e \u301011\u2020Vietnam\u2020seller-vn.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\n  * Ciascun TikTok Shop pu\u00f2 disporre di 1 solo account TikTok ufficiale.\n\n  * Ciascun account TikTok pu\u00f2 essere collegato a 1 solo TikTok Shop come account TikTok ufficiale. "type": "webpage_extended", "title": "TikTok Shopping &amp; Showcase | TikTok For Business", "url": "https://ads.tiktok.com/help/article/tiktok-shopping-and-showcase?lang=it", "pub_date": null, "snippet": "\nUna scheda Vetrina dei prodotti pu\u00f2 contenere prodotti delle seguenti opzioni:\n\n  * Tutti i prodotti di un TikTok Shop.\n\n  * Alcuni prodotti di un negozio.\n\n  * Prodotti provenienti da pi\u00f9 negozi.\n\n[Image 1: TikTok Shopping and Showcase-PNG]\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere prima di utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\n  1. TikTok Shop e le Presentazioni non sono uguali.\n\n     * Se hai soltanto una Vetrina e non un TikTok Shop, puoi comunque fare pubblicit\u00e0 utilizzando i prodotti nella tua vetrina e fare riferimento a \u30103\u2020Come configurare Video Shopping Ads con Vetrina\u3011.\n\n     * Se scegli Vetrina o TikTok Shop come origine prodotto, l\u2019elenco dei prodotti che possono essere selezionati per la pubblicit\u00e0 cambia di conseguenza.\n\n     * Ricordati che TikTok Shop contiene l\u2019inventario dei prodotti di propriet\u00e0 del venditore. Se vendi i prodotti attraverso un account affiliato o di marketing, \u00e8 possibile che tu possieda un TikTok Shop.\n\n  2. Da notare che non tutti coloro che possiedono una Vetrina hanno un TikTok Shop.\n\n     * Ad esempio, un brand pu\u00f2 concedere a un terzo l\u2019autorizzazione a vendere prodotti a suo nome. Questi prodotti sono visualizzati nella Vetrina del terzo per essere acquistati dai clienti. Un terzo non possiede i prodotti che vende, ma piuttosto vende i prodotti per conto del brand.\n\n## Ecco cosa devi sapere per utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina \n\nPossedere una Vetrina non significa necessariamente possedere un TikTok Shop. Gli esempi che seguono mostrano i diversi scenari che si verificano tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina.\n\n### Esempi \n\n  1. Per un account TikTok ufficiale, tutti i prodotti di un brand verranno automaticamente visualizzati nella loro Vetrina.\n\n  2. Un brand pu\u00f2 consentire agli account commerciali/affiliati di vendere i prodotti per suo conto. La Vetrina degli account commerciali/affiliati visualizzer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un negozio.\n\n     * Esempio 1: un brand di calzature pu\u00f2 consentire a pi\u00f9 account commerciali, gestiti da terzi, di vendere prodotti a suo nome.\n\n     * Esempio 2: due brand diversi di calzature possono consentire a un account affiliato/di marketing gestito da un importante rivenditore al dettaglio o da uno store specializzato di vendere prodotti per conto di entrambi i brand.\n\n## Come utilizzare TikTok Shop e Vetrina\n\n### Come account TikTok ufficiale \n\nSe sei un account TikTok ufficiale con un TikTok Shop, la tua Vetrina mostrer\u00e0 tutti i tuoi prodotti.\n\n##### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok ufficiale. Dopo che il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok ha confermato il link, tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop vengono automaticamente visualizzati nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese in cui vende lo shop. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30109\u2020Regno Unito\u2020seller-uk.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301010\u2020Stati Uniti\u2020seller-us.tiktok.com\u3011 e \u301011\u2020Vietnam\u2020seller-vn.tiktok.com\u3011.\n\n  * Ciascun TikTok Shop pu\u00f2 disporre di 1 solo account TikTok ufficiale.\n\n  * Ciascun account TikTok pu\u00f2 essere collegato a 1 solo TikTok Shop come account TikTok ufficiale. Un account TikTok ufficiale non pu\u00f2 essere collegato ad altri TikTok Shop.\n\n### Come account TikTok per il marketing \n\nLa tua vetrina mostrer\u00e0 alcuni o tutti i prodotti di un brand.\n\n#### Come sono collegati i tuoi prodotti tra TikTok Shop e Vetrina:\n\n  * In Seller Center collega un account TikTok per il marketing. Dopo aver confermato il link, il titolare dell\u2019account TikTok pu\u00f2 selezionare alcuni o tutti i prodotti del TikTok Shop per mostrarli nella Vetrina.\n\n  * Il link dipende dal Paese. Per maggiori informazioni scegli il tuo Paese: \u30104\u2020Indonesia\u2020seller-id.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30105\u2020Malesia\u2020seller-my.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30106\u2020Filippine\u2020seller-ph.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30107\u2020Singapore\u2020seller-sg.tiktok.com\u3011, \u30108\u2020Thailandia\u2020seller-th.tiktok.com\u3011, \u301012\u2020Regno I work with something called a &quot;context window,&quot; which refers to the amount of conversation history or data I can actively remember during our session. This memory capacity is typically measured in tokens (a token could be a word or part of a word), and I have a limit of how many tokens I can retain at any one time. For instance, OpenAI&#x27;s GPT-4 has a context window that allows for around 8,000 tokens in its standard version, and there are other models with larger windows (up to 32,000 tokens).\n\nAs we continue our conversation, older parts of the chat will be &quot;forgotten&quot; if we exceed this token limit. However, this doesn&#x27;t mean they are permanently lost\u2014while in this session I can&#x27;t retrieve them, you could provide past information or use external tools to store ongoing discussions.\n\nTo manage memory more effectively, I also work with persistent memory tools (like the one here, where I remember key information across sessions) so that important details don&#x27;t get lost. this conversation, and how many we have remaining before reaching the token limit?&quot;*\n\nThis should help you get a clear idea of where you stand regarding token usage. Additionally, models generally return a token count based on both the user\u2019s input and the model\u2019s responses, so this prompt helps keep track of that balance.\n\nNote: Different It was introduced in 2009 as part of an EU directive to make Europe a more appealing destination for qualified professionals from outside the EU, especially in fields like science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM).\n\n### Key Features:\n1. **Eligibility**: To qualify for the EU Blue Card, applicants must:\n   - Hold a higher education degree or have equivalent professional qualifications.\n   - Have a job offer or employment contract in an EU member state that meets a certain salary threshold (which varies depending on the country and sector).\n   - Prove that the job requires high-level skills.\n\n2. **Validity**: The Blue Card is typically valid for 1 to 4 years, depending on the length of the job contract. It can be renewed and eventually lead to permanent residency in some cases.\n\n3. **Benefits**:\n   - Allows the holder to live and work in an EU member state (except Denmark and Ireland, which don\u2019t participate).\n   - Facilitates family reunification, as family members can accompany the Blue Card holder.\n   - Provides the right to travel freely within the Schengen Area.\n   - After 18 months, Blue Card holders can move to another EU country to take up a similar job.\n\n4. **Path to Permanent Residency**: Blue Card holders can apply for permanent residency after a certain period, generally around five years of continuous residence in an EU member state.\n\n### Is it Legit?\nYes, the EU Blue Card is a fully recognized and legal program in the EU. It&#x27;s part of the EU&#x27;s effort to attract highly skilled workers and fill labor shortages in certain industries. However, the program&#x27;s specific implementation and requirements can vary by country, as each EU nation sets its own salary thresholds and processing rules."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", you\u2019re applying, but in general, it can take anywhere from **2 to 6 months** to complete. This includes the time needed for the employer to process the work contract, for authorities to assess the application, and for any additional administrative procedures (like background checks or document verification).\n\n### Steps and Timelines:\n1. **Securing a Job Offer**: The most important and time-consuming part is often finding a job offer that meets the Blue Card requirements. The job offer must be from an employer in an EU member state that is part of the Blue Card system, and the position must meet salary and skills criteria. Without this, you **cannot apply for the Blue Card**, as the job offer is mandatory.\n   \n2. **Application Submission**: Once you have a job offer, the submission of the application can usually be done by either you or your employer. Required documents typically include your employment contract, proof of qualifications, passport, and health insurance.\n   \n3. **Processing**: After submitting the application, the processing time varies by country. In some EU countries, it may take around **4 to 12 weeks** (1 to 3 months) to process, while in others it can be longer, depending on the volume of applications and how efficiently the authorities handle the process.\n\n### Can You Apply Without a Job Offer?\nNo, you **cannot apply** for an EU Blue Card without a job offer that meets the program&#x27;s requirements. The Blue Card is job-specific, meaning you must have an offer of employment in an EU country that sponsors your application. If you don\u2019t have a job offer yet, the focus should be on finding an employer who is willing to hire you and sponsor your Blue Card application.\n\n### What Should You Do if You Don&#x27;t Have a Job Offer?\n1. **Job Search**: Look for job opportunities that match your skills and are willing to sponsor an EU Blue Card. Many companies post job listings specifically mentioning their willingness to sponsor candidates for the Blue Card.\n   \n2. **Networking**: Reach out to recruitment agencies and employers in your field within the EU, attend virtual job fairs, and use platforms like LinkedIn to connect with potential employers.\n   \n3. **Job Portals**: Check out job search portals that cater specifically to highly skilled professionals looking to work in the EU, such as **EURES**, which lists jobs across the EU, including positions where Blue Card sponsorship is available.\n\nIf you do not have a job offer yet, focus on that step before proceeding with the application process."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"citations": [], Subsequently, the 32nd MAU is ordered out of Beirut by the President of the United States.\n\n    14 September 1982 \u2013 Lebanon&#x27;s President, Bachir Gemayel, is assassinated.\n\n    16 September to 18 September 1982 \u2013 The \u3010232\u2020Sabra and Shatila massacre\u3011 occurs.\n\n    19 September 1982 \u2013 The destroyer USS John Rodgers and nuclear cruiser USS Virginia, operating off the coast of Beirut, conduct a naval bombardment onto the town of Suk al Gharb, in the hills overlooking Beirut, in support of the Lebanese Army, after it is nearly overrun by Syrian-backed Druze militiamen and Palestinian guerrillas. Over 300 rounds of 5&quot; shells are fired to suppress the attack.[ 15 ]\n\n    20 September 1982 \u2013 The Beirut residence of the U.S. ambassador is shelled; for a second day US naval ships again conduct counter fire operations.[ 16 ]\n\n    21 September 1982 \u2013 Bachir Gemayel&#x27;s brother, \u3010280\u2020Amine Gemayel\u3011, is elected to be Lebanon&#x27;s president.\n\n    29 September 1982 \u2013 The 32nd \u3010279\u2020MAU\u3011 is redeployed to Beirut (primarily at the BIA) rejoining 2,200 French and Italian MNF troops already in place.\n\n    30 October 1982 \u2013 The 32nd MAU is relieved by the 24th MAU.\n\n    15 February 1983 \u2013 The 32nd MAU, redesignated as the 22nd MAU, returns to Lebanon to relieve the 24th MAU.\n\n    18 April 1983 \u2013 The \u3010281\u2020U.S. Embassy bombing\u3011 in Beirut kills 63, of whom 17 are Americans.\n\n    17 May 1983 \u2013 The \u3010282\u2020May 17 Agreement\u3011 is signed.\n\n    30 May 1983 \u2013 The 24th MAU relieves the 22nd MAU.[ 17 ]\n\n### Mission\n\n[\u3010283\u2020edit\u3011]\n\n[Image 4]The USMC barracks in Beirut\n\nOn June 6, 1982, the \u3010284\u2020Israel Defense Forces\u3011 (IDF) initiated Operation &quot;Peace for Galilee&quot; and invaded Lebanon in order to create a 40 km buffer zone between the PLO and \u3010285\u2020Syrian\u3011 forces in Lebanon and Israel.[ 18 ][ 19 ][ 20 ] The Israeli invasion was tacitly approved by the U.S., and the U.S. provided overt military support to Israel in the form of arms and materiel.[ 21 ] The U.S.&#x27; support for Israel&#x27;s invasion of Lebanon taken in conjunction with U.S. support for Lebanese President \u3010278\u2020Bachir Gemayel\u3011 and the \u3010286\u2020Lebanese Armed Forces\u3011 (LAF) alienated many.[ 22 ]\n\nBachir Gemayel was the legally elected president, but he was a partisan \u3010287\u2020Maronite Christian\u3011 and covert associate of Israel.[ 23 ] These factors served to disaffect the \u3010288\u2020Lebanese Muslim\u3011 and \u3010289\u2020Druze\u3011 communities. This animosity was made worse by the \u3010290\u2020Phalangist\u3011, a right-wing, largely Maronite-Lebanese militia force closely associated with President Gemayel. The Phalangist militia was responsible for multiple, bloody attacks against the Muslim and Druze communities in Lebanon and for the 1982 atrocities committed in the PLO refugee camps, \u3010232\u2020Sabra and Shatila\u3011 by \u3010291\u2020Lebanese Forces\u3011 (LF), while the IDF provided security and looked on.[ 24 ][ 25 ]\n\nThe Phalangist militia&#x27;s attacks on Sabra and Shatila were purportedly a response to the September 14, 1982, assassination of President-elect Bachir Gemayel.[ 24 ][ 26 ][ 27 ] \u3010280\u2020Amine Gemayel\u3011, Bachir&#x27;s brother, succeeded Bachir as the elected president of Lebanon, and Amine continued to represent and advance Maronite interests. \n\nAll of this, according to British foreign correspondent \u3010292\u2020Robert Fisk\u3011, served to generate ill will against the MNF among Lebanese Muslims and especially among the \u3010293\u2020Shiites\u3011 living in the slums of West Beirut. Lebanese Muslims believed the MNF, and the Americans in particular, were unfairly siding with the Maronite Christians in their attempt to dominate Lebanon.[ 28 ][ 29 ][ 30 ] As a result, this led to artillery, mortar, and small arms fire being directed at MNF peacekeepers by Muslim factions. Operating under the \u3010294\u2020peacetime\u3011 \u3010295\u2020rules of engagement\u3011, MNF peacekeepers \u2013 primarily U.S. and French forces \u2013 used ", "title": "1983 Beirut barracks bombings - Wikipedia", "tether_id": null}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 0.0, "metadata": {"_cite_metadata": {"citation_format": {"name": "tether_og"}, "metadata_list": [{"type": "webpage", "title": "1983 Beirut barracks bombings - Wikipedia", "url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1983_Beirut_barracks_bombings", "text": "\n    10 September 1982 \u2013 The PLO retreats from Beirut under MNF protection. Subsequently, the 32nd MAU is ordered out of Beirut by the President of the United States.\n\n    14 September 1982 \u2013 Lebanon&#x27;s President, Bachir Gemayel, is assassinated.\n\n    16 September to 18 September 1982 \u2013 The \u3010232\u2020Sabra and Shatila massacre\u3011 occurs.\n\n    19 September 1982 \u2013 The destroyer USS John Rodgers and nuclear cruiser USS Virginia, operating off the coast of Beirut, conduct a naval bombardment onto the town of Suk al Gharb, in the hills overlooking Beirut, in support of the Lebanese Army, after it is nearly overrun by Syrian-backed Druze militiamen and Palestinian guerrillas. Over 300 rounds of 5&quot; shells are fired to suppress the attack.[ 15 ]\n\n    20 September 1982 \u2013 The Beirut residence of the U.S. ambassador is shelled; for a second day US naval ships again conduct counter fire operations.[ 16 ]\n\n    21 September 1982 \u2013 Bachir Gemayel&#x27;s brother, \u3010280\u2020Amine Gemayel\u3011, is elected to be Lebanon&#x27;s president.\n\n    29 September 1982 \u2013 The 32nd \u3010279\u2020MAU\u3011 is redeployed to Beirut (primarily at the BIA) rejoining 2,200 French and Italian MNF troops already in place.\n\n    30 October 1982 \u2013 The 32nd MAU is relieved by the 24th MAU.\n\n    15 February 1983 \u2013 The 32nd MAU, redesignated as the 22nd MAU, returns to Lebanon to relieve the 24th MAU.\n\n    18 April 1983 \u2013 The \u3010281\u2020U.S. Embassy bombing\u3011 in Beirut kills 63, of whom 17 are Americans.\n\n    17 May 1983 \u2013 The \u3010282\u2020May 17 Agreement\u3011 is signed.\n\n    30 May 1983 \u2013 The 24th MAU relieves the 22nd MAU.[ 17 ]\n\n### Mission\n\n[\u3010283\u2020edit\u3011]\n\n[Image 4]The USMC barracks in Beirut\n\nOn June 6, 1982, the \u3010284\u2020Israel Defense Forces\u3011 (IDF) initiated Operation &quot;Peace for Galilee&quot; and invaded Lebanon in order to create a 40 km buffer zone between the PLO and \u3010285\u2020Syrian\u3011 forces in Lebanon and Israel.[ 18 ][ 19 ][ 20 ] The Israeli invasion was tacitly approved by the U.S., and the U.S. provided overt military support to Israel in the form of arms and materiel.[ 21 ] The U.S.&#x27; support for Israel&#x27;s invasion of Lebanon taken in conjunction with U.S. support for Lebanese President \u3010278\u2020Bachir Gemayel\u3011 and the \u3010286\u2020Lebanese Armed Forces\u3011 (LAF) alienated many.[ 22 ]\n\nBachir Gemayel was the legally elected president, but he was a partisan \u3010287\u2020Maronite Christian\u3011 and covert associate of Israel.[ 23 ] These factors served to disaffect the \u3010288\u2020Lebanese Muslim\u3011 and \u3010289\u2020Druze\u3011 communities. This animosity was made worse by the \u3010290\u2020Phalangist\u3011, a right-wing, largely Maronite-Lebanese militia force closely associated with President Gemayel. The Phalangist militia was responsible for multiple, bloody attacks against the Muslim and Druze communities in Lebanon and for the 1982 atrocities committed in the PLO refugee camps, \u3010232\u2020Sabra and Shatila\u3011 by \u3010291\u2020Lebanese Forces\u3011 (LF), while the IDF provided security and looked on.[ 24 ][ 25 ]\n\nThe Phalangist militia&#x27;s attacks on Sabra and Shatila were purportedly a response to the September 14, 1982, assassination of President-elect Bachir Gemayel.[ 24 ][ 26 ][ 27 ] \u3010280\u2020Amine Gemayel\u3011, Bachir&#x27;s brother, succeeded Bachir as the elected president of Lebanon, and Amine continued to represent and advance Maronite interests. \n\nAll of this, according to British foreign correspondent \u3010292\u2020Robert Fisk\u3011, served to generate ill will against the MNF among Lebanese Muslims and especially among the \u3010293\u2020Shiites\u3011 living in the slums of West Beirut. Lebanese Muslims believed the MNF, and the Americans in particular, were unfairly siding with the Maronite Christians in their attempt to dominate Lebanon.[ 28 ][ 29 ][ 30 ] As a result, this led to artillery, mortar, and small arms fire being directed at MNF peacekeepers by Muslim factions.
